CVE-2011-0001.title: tgt Double-Free Memory Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0001.body: A vulnerability was reported in tgt. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a double-free flaw and cause the target tgtd daemon to crash.The vulnerability resides in '/usr/iscsi/iscsid.c'.Emmanuel Bouillon of NATO C3 Agency reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This application is part of the 'scsi-target-utils' package on Red Hat.]
CVE-2011-0001.extra: A remote user can cause the tgt daemon to crash.

CVE-2011-0002.title: Libuser LDAP Account Creation Default Password May Let Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2011-0002.body: A vulnerability was reported in Libuser. A remote or local user can bypass security controls.The software may create LDAP users with default passwords. A remote or local user can login using a default password.The specific impact depends on the application that uses libuser.
CVE-2011-0002.extra: A remote or local user can bypass password access controls in certain cases.

CVE-2011-0013.title: Apache Tomcat Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0013.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The HTML Manager interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Tomcat software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit string is provided:<display-name><script>alert('hi');</script></display-name>
CVE-2011-0013.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Tomcat software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0014.title: OpenSSL ClientHello Parsing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0014.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. An application may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send a specially crafted ClientHello handshake message to cause the target service to crash.An application using OpenSSL may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information, such as an OCSP nonce extension, from memory.Applications that act as a server and call SSL_CTX_set_tlsext_status_cb on the server's SSL_CTX (e.g., Apache httpd >= 2.3.3) are affected.The vulnerability resides in 'ssl/t1_lib.c'.Neel Mehta (Google) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0014.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.An application may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0015.title: Tor Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service and Let Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0015.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Tor. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted z-lib compressed data to cause denial of service conditions. 'doorss' reported this vulnerability.A local user with certain privileges can access potentially sensitive information from memory. 'cypherpunks' reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0015.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0016.title: Tor Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service and Let Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0016.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Tor. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted z-lib compressed data to cause denial of service conditions. 'doorss' reported this vulnerability.A local user with certain privileges can access potentially sensitive information from memory. 'cypherpunks' reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0016.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0019.title: Red Hat Directory Server Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0019.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send multiple simple paged search requests to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2011-0019].When multiple Red Hat Directory Server instances are configured to run under different unprivileged users, the Directory Server setup scripts set insecure permissions on the '/var/run/dirsrv/' directory [CVE-2011-0022]. A local user can modify the pid files in the directory, which may prevent Directory Server instances from starting correctly or cause the Directory Server init script to kill an arbitrary process when shutting down the Directory Server.Multiple scripts set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to an insecure value containing an empty path [CVE-2011-0532]. A local user can create a specially crafted dynamic library in a directory and then have a target user run the vulnerable scripts from the directory to gain elevated privileges.
CVE-2011-0019.extra: A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0020.title: Pango Heap Overflow in pango_ft2_font_render_box_glyph() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0020.body: A vulnerability was reported in Pango. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vulnerability resides in pango_ft2_font_render_box_glyph() in 'pango/pangoft2-render.c'.Dan Rosenberg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0020.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0022.title: Red Hat Directory Server Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0022.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send multiple simple paged search requests to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2011-0019].When multiple Red Hat Directory Server instances are configured to run under different unprivileged users, the Directory Server setup scripts set insecure permissions on the '/var/run/dirsrv/' directory [CVE-2011-0022]. A local user can modify the pid files in the directory, which may prevent Directory Server instances from starting correctly or cause the Directory Server init script to kill an arbitrary process when shutting down the Directory Server.Multiple scripts set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to an insecure value containing an empty path [CVE-2011-0532]. A local user can create a specially crafted dynamic library in a directory and then have a target user run the vulnerable scripts from the directory to gain elevated privileges.
CVE-2011-0022.extra: A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0026.title: Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC) Memory Corruption Errors in Processing DSN Data and ADO Records Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0026.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke a third party application that will trigger a buffer overflow in the Data Source Name (DSN) argument of an Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) API and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0026]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Abdul Aziz Hariri reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory allocation error in an ActiveX Data Object (ADO) record and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0027]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Peter Vreugdenhil reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0026.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0027.title: Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC) Memory Corruption Errors in Processing DSN Data and ADO Records Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0027.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke a third party application that will trigger a buffer overflow in the Data Source Name (DSN) argument of an Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) API and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0026]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Abdul Aziz Hariri reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory allocation error in an ActiveX Data Object (ADO) record and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0027]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Peter Vreugdenhil reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0027.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0030.title: Windows Client-Server Run-time Subsystem Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0030.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Client-Server Run-time Subsystem (CSRSS). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute code to monitor the actions of a target user that subsequently logs into the system.Sihan Qing (Professor), Weiping Wen (Associate Professor), Liang Yi and Husheng Zhou (Graduate students), Department of Information Security, Beijing University, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0030.extra: A local user can monitor the actions of a target user to obtain information, potentially including authentication credentials.

CVE-2011-0031.title: Microsoft JScript and VBScript Disclose Information to Remote Users
CVE-2011-0031.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Microsoft JScript and VBScript Engines. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and access potentially sensitive information on the target user's system.Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0031.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0033.title: Windows OpenType Compact Font Format Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0033.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows OpenType Compact Font Format. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create content containing a specially crafted Compact Font Format (CFF) font that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2011-0033.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0035.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0035.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object initialization error or DLL loading error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2011-0035.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0036.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0036.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object initialization error or DLL loading error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2011-0036.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0037.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Registry Processing Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0037.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Malware Protection Engine. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can create a specially crafted Registry key that, when scanned by the malware engine, will trigger a flaw in 'mpengine.dll' and execute arbitrary code with LocalSystem privileges.The following products include the vulnerable component and are affected:Windows Live OneCareMicrosoft Security EssentialsMicrosoft Windows DefenderMicrosoft Forefront Client SecurityMicrosoft Forefront Endpoint Protection 2010Microsoft Malicious Software Removal ToolThe Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT) is only affected when run after being offered via Automatic Update. It is not affected when run manually.The Microsoft Antigen for Exchange, Microsoft Antigen for SMTP Gateway, Forefront Protection 2010 for Exchange Server, Forefront Threat Management Gateway 2010, Microsoft Forefront Security for SharePoint, Forefront Security for Office Communications Server, and Microsoft Standalone System Sweeper (part of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset) products are not affected.Cesar Cerrudo of Argeniss reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0037.extra: A local user can obtain LocalSystem privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0039.title: Microsoft Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS) Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0039.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send a specially crafted authentication request to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.Jorge Moura of Primavera BSS reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0039.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0040.title: Microsoft Active Directory SPN Collosions May Let Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0040.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Active Directory. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.The system does not properly validate service principal name (SPN) values. A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause the target system to downgrade from Kerberos to NT LAN Manager (NTLM) and potentially cause the service to stop responding.
CVE-2011-0040.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2011-0042.title: Windows Media Player and Windows Media Center Error in Parsing '.dvr-ms' Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0042.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player and Windows Media Center. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.dvr-ms' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Matthew Watchinski of Sourcefire VRT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0042.extra: A remote user can create a '.dvr-ms' file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0043.title: Windows Kerberos Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0043.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Kerberos on Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Microsoft Kerberos implementation supports a weak hashing mechanism [CVE-2011-0043]. A local user can forge portions of a Kerberos service ticket to obtain a token with elevated privileges on the target system.The MIT Kerberos Team reported this vulnerability.A local user can downgrade Kerberos authentication to use DES and impersonate a valid user's credentials or forge Kerberos traffic. Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 are affected.Scott Stender of iSEC Partners for reporting the Kerberos Spoofing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0091)
CVE-2011-0043.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0045.title: Windows Kernel Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0045.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a driver-kernel interaction error [CVE-2010-4398] or integer truncation error [CVE-2011-0045] to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.Zhengwenbin of 360safe, std_logic (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Guo Bojun, Wei Zhang, and Marco Giuliani of Prevx reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0045.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0049.title: Majordomo 2 Directory Traversal Flaw Discloses Arbitrary Files to Remote Users
CVE-2011-0049.body: A vulnerability was reported in Majordomo 2. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system. The flaw can be exploited via all Majordomo 2 interfaces.A demonstration exploit e-mail command is provided:help ../../../../../../../../../../../../../etc/passwdA demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/cgi-bin/mj_wwwusr?passw=&list=GLOBAL&user=&func=help&extra=/../../../../../../../../etc/passwdThe original advisory is available at:https://sitewat.ch/en/Advisory/View/1
CVE-2011-0049.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2011-0091.title: Windows Kerberos Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0091.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Kerberos on Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Microsoft Kerberos implementation supports a weak hashing mechanism [CVE-2011-0043]. A local user can forge portions of a Kerberos service ticket to obtain a token with elevated privileges on the target system.The MIT Kerberos Team reported this vulnerability.A local user can downgrade Kerberos authentication to use DES and impersonate a valid user's credentials or forge Kerberos traffic. Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 are affected.Scott Stender of iSEC Partners for reporting the Kerberos Spoofing Vulnerability (CVE-2011-0091)
CVE-2011-0091.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0092.title: Microsoft Visio Memory Corruption Error in Processing Visio Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0092.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Visio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Visio file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Procyun via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported one vulnerability. Xin Ouyang of Palo Alto Networks reported both vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0092.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0093.title: Microsoft Visio Memory Corruption Error in Processing Visio Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0093.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Visio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Visio file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Procyun via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported one vulnerability. Xin Ouyang of Palo Alto Networks reported both vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0093.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0094.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Hijack User Clicks
CVE-2011-0094.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can view content from another domain. A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An uninitialized layout object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-0094].A specially crafted frame tag can allow a remote user to obtain potentially sensitive information or conduct clickjacking attacks [CVE-2011-1244].Specially crafted javascript can allow a remote user to view content from another domain or Internet Explorer zone [CVE-2011-1245].An uninitialized memory object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-1345].An anonymous researcher (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), MITRE, David Bloom of Google Inc., and Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0094.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can view content from another domain.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.

CVE-2011-0096.title: Microsoft MHTML Input Validation Hole May Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0096.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft MHTML. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.MHTML does not properly process MIME-formatted requests for content blocks within a document. A remote user may be able to inject a client-side script in the response of a Web request running in the context of the target user's Internet Explorer.[On March 11, 2011, the vendor updated their advisory to indicate that this vulnerability is being actively exploited in limited attacks.]
CVE-2011-0096.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the target site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0097.title: Microsoft Excel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0097.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Muhammad Junaid Bohio of Telus Security Labs, Aniway (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0097.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Muhammad Junaid Bohio of Telus Security Labs, Aniway (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2011-0158.title: Apple iOS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0158.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to exit and launch an application [CVE-2011-0158]. The browser will repeat the action when reopened. Nitesh Dhanjani of Ernst & Young LLP reported this vulnerability.In some situations, the browser will not clear the cookies when requested via the Safari Settings while the browser is running [CVE-2011-0159]. Systems prior to iOS 4.0 are not affected. Erik Wong of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.WebKit may disclose the target user's HTTP Basic Authentication credentials to another site [CVE-2011-0160] when the target site redirects to a different site. McIntosh Cooey of Twelve Hundred Group, Harald Hanche-Olsen, Chuck Hohn of 1111 Internet LLC (via US-CERT), and Paul Hinze of Braintree reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will inject CSS code into other documents [CVE-2011-0161]. The vendor reported this vulnerability.A remote user on the local Wi-Fi network can cause the target device to reset [CVE-2011-0162]. Scott Boyd of ePlus Technology, inc. reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will poison the web cache and prevent other sites from requesting certain resources [CVE-2011-0163]. The vendor reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0158.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0159.title: Apple iOS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0159.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to exit and launch an application [CVE-2011-0158]. The browser will repeat the action when reopened. Nitesh Dhanjani of Ernst & Young LLP reported this vulnerability.In some situations, the browser will not clear the cookies when requested via the Safari Settings while the browser is running [CVE-2011-0159]. Systems prior to iOS 4.0 are not affected. Erik Wong of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.WebKit may disclose the target user's HTTP Basic Authentication credentials to another site [CVE-2011-0160] when the target site redirects to a different site. McIntosh Cooey of Twelve Hundred Group, Harald Hanche-Olsen, Chuck Hohn of 1111 Internet LLC (via US-CERT), and Paul Hinze of Braintree reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will inject CSS code into other documents [CVE-2011-0161]. The vendor reported this vulnerability.A remote user on the local Wi-Fi network can cause the target device to reset [CVE-2011-0162]. Scott Boyd of ePlus Technology, inc. reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will poison the web cache and prevent other sites from requesting certain resources [CVE-2011-0163]. The vendor reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0159.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0166.title: Apple Safari Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2011-0166.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.When a target user visits a specially crafted web site and drags content within the page, a remote user may be able to obtain information from a different web site [CVE-2011-0166]. Michal Zalewski of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.When a target user visit a specially crafted web site, files may be sent to the site [CVE-2011-0167]. Aaron Sigel of vtty.com reported this vulnerability.The 'window.console._inspectorCommandLineAPI' property of the Web Inspector does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0169]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The vendor reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0166.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with a target site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0188.title: Ruby 64-bit BigDecimal Integer Truncation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0188.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to a Ruby script that uses untrusted input to create a BigDecimal object to potentially trigger an integer truncation flaw and execute arbitrary code.64-bit processes are affected.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0188.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0192.title: LibTIFF Heap Overflow in Processing CCITT Group 4 Encoded TIFF Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0192.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted CCITT Group 4 encoded TIFF image that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Apple Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0192.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0195.title: libxslt generate-id() Discloses Heap Addresses to Remote Users
CVE-2011-0195.body: A vulnerability was reported in libxslt. A remote user can obtain memory addresses on the heap.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in the generate-id() XPath function to determine addresses on the heap. This may assist the remote user in bypassing address space layout randomization protection.Chris Evans of Google Chrome Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0195.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will disclose memory addresses on the heap.

CVE-2011-0228.title: Apple iOS Certificate Chain Validation Flaw Lets Certain Remote Users Access or Modify SSL/TLS Sessions
CVE-2011-0228.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iOS. A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can access or modify SSL/TLS sessions.A remote user in a privileged network position can exploit a certificate chain validation flaw to access or modify data ostensibly protected by SSL/TLS.Gregor Kopf of Recurity Labs on behalf of BSI and Paul Kehrer of Trustwave's SpiderLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0228.extra: A remote user can access and modify data within an SSL/TLS session.

CVE-2011-0262.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0262.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Aniway.Anyway at gmail.com (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), SilentSignal (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), and an anonymous researcher (via iDefense VCP) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0262.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0271.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0273.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0273.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Abdul Aziz Hariri of ThridEyeTesters and an anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0273.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0274.title: HP Business Availability Center and Business Service Management Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0274.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Business Availability Center and Business Service Management. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Business Availability Center software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following product versions are affected:Business Availability Center (BAC) v7.55 and earlier on Windows and SolarisBusiness Availability Center (BAC) v8.05 and earlier on Windows and SolarisBusiness Service Management (BSM) v9.01 and earlier on Windows onlyDaniel Frye reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0274.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Business Availability Center software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0277.title: HP Power Manager Permits Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-0277.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Power Manager (HPPM). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting and cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Power Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability via Secunia.
CVE-2011-0277.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HPPM software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0279.title: HP MFP Digital Sending Software Lets Local Users Disable Authentication
CVE-2011-0279.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP MFP Digital Sending Software. A local user can disable authentication.A local user can cause authentication to be disabled for managed devices.
CVE-2011-0279.extra: A local user can disable authentication.

CVE-2011-0281.title: Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC) Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0281.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC). A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to a target KDC configured with an LDAP back end to cause the target service to become unresponsive [CVE-2011-0281] or crash [CVE-2011-0282].A remote user can send specially crafted data to a target KDC configured with an arbitrary back end to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2011-0283]. Only version krb5-1.9 is affected.Kevin Longfellow of Oracle Corporation and Zbysek Mraz of Red Hat each reported two of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0281.extra: A remote user can cause the target KDC to become unresponsive or crash.

CVE-2011-0284.title: MIT Kerberos KDC Double Free in perpare_error_as() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0284.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a double-free in the Key Distribution Center (KDC) in the perpare_error_as() function and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems with PKINIT enabled are affected.Third-party pre-authentication plugins that generate TYPED-DATA in the e-data field of a KRB-ERROR message may also be affected.Cameron Meadors of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0284.extra: A remote user can cause the KDC daemon to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2011-0285.title: Kerberos kadmind Can Be Crashed By a Remote Users Conducting an NMAP Scan
CVE-2011-0285.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target kadmind service to free an invalid pointer and crash.A demonstration exploit command is provided:nmap -n -sV [target]The original advisory is available at:http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=621726Felipe Ortega reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0285.extra: A remote user can cause kadmind to crash.

CVE-2011-0286.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Input Validation Flaw in BlackBerry Web Desktop Manager Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0286.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Enterprise Server's BlackBerry Web Desktop Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The BlackBerry Web Desktop Manager not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the BlackBerry Web Desktop Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following product versions are affected:BlackBerry Enterprise Server Express versions 5.0.1 and 5.0.2 for Microsoft ExchangeBlackBerry Enterprise Server Express version 5.0.2 for IBM Lotus DominoBlackBerry Enterprise Server versions 5.0.0 through 5.0.3 for Microsoft Exchange and IBM Lotus DominoBlackBerry Enterprise Server version 5.0.1 for Novell GroupWiseIvan Huertas of Cybsec reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0286.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the BlackBerry Web Desktop Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0290.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Collaboration Service Bug Lets Remote Users Impersonate Intra-organization Messages
CVE-2011-0290.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Enterprise Server. A remote user can impersonate another messaging user within the same organization.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the BlackBerry Collaboration Service component to login to the BlackBerry Collaboration Service as another BlackBerry Collaboration Service user within the same organization. The user can send messages acting as the target user.The following versions are affected:BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Microsoft Exchange versions 5.0.3 through 5.0.3 MR4BlackBerry Enterprise Server for IBM Lotus Domino versions 5.0.3 through 5.0.3 MR4
CVE-2011-0290.extra: A remote messaging user can impersonate another messaging user within the same organization.

CVE-2011-0291.title: Blackberry PlayBook File Sharing Option Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0291.body: A vulnerability was reported in Blackberry PlayBook. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On a tablet with File Sharing enabled and connected via USB to a system running BlackBerry Desktop Software, a user can modify a backup archive file on the system to gain root privileges on the target tablet.
CVE-2011-0291.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target tablet system.

CVE-2011-0321.title: Legato NetWorker 'librpc.dll' Spoofing Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0321.body: A vulnerability was reported in Legato NetWorker. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send spoofed packets via UDP to access the 'nsrexecd' service. The remote user can unregister existing NetWorker RPC services to cause denial of service conditions or register new RPC services to eavesdrop on process communications to obtain potentially sensitive information.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0321.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0329.title: Dell ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users View Files and Obtain System Informations
CVE-2011-0329.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the 'DellSystemLite.Scanner' Dell ActiveX Control. A remote user can obtain system information. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the GetData() method to access files on the target user's system [CVE-2011-0329].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in the 'WMIAttributesOfInterest' property to obtain potentially sensitive system information [CVE-2011-0330].The vendor was notified on January 26, 2011.The original advisories are available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2011-10/http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2011-11/Dmitriy Pletnev, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0329.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive system information.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2011-0330.title: Dell ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users View Files and Obtain System Informations
CVE-2011-0330.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the 'DellSystemLite.Scanner' Dell ActiveX Control. A remote user can obtain system information. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the GetData() method to access files on the target user's system [CVE-2011-0329].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in the 'WMIAttributesOfInterest' property to obtain potentially sensitive system information [CVE-2011-0330].The vendor was notified on January 26, 2011.The original advisories are available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2011-10/http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2011-11/Dmitriy Pletnev, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0330.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive system information.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2011-0332.title: Foxit Reader Heap Overflow in Processing ICC Chunks Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0332.body: A vulnerability was reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted ICC chunks that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on February 15, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2011-14/Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0332.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0346.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Use-After-Free in 'mshtml.dll' May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0346.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access previously freed memory and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified in July 2010.The original advisory is available at:http://lcamtuf.blogspot.com/2011/01/announcing-crossfuzz-potential-0-day-in.htmlMichal Zalewski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0346.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0348.title: Cisco Content Services Gateway Bugs Let Users Bypass Billing Policies and Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0348.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Content Services Gateway. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass access controls and billing policies.A remote user can access sites via HTTP without the billing policy being enforced [CVE-2011-0348]. A remote user can also access URLs that are explicitly denied. The Cisco Content Services Gateway - Second Generation (CSG2), which runs on the Cisco Service and Application Module for IP (SAMI), is affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtk35917 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target device to hang and stop passing traffic [CVE-2011-0349, CVE-2011-0350]. A manual reload of the SAMI card may be required to return to normal operations. Only Cisco IOS Software Release 12.4(24)MD1 on the Cisco CSG2 is affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCth17178 and CSCth41891 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Content Services Gateway - 1st Generation (CSG) is not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0348.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can access sites without the billing policy being enforced.A remote user can access URLs that are explicitly denied.

CVE-2011-0355.title: VMware ESX/Cisco Nexus 1000V Packet Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0355.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESX/Cisco Nexus 1000V. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module (VEM) virtual switch for ESX and ESXi does not properly process dropped packets. A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target ESX or ESXi kernel to crash.VMware users that have deployed the Cisco Nexus 1000V virtual switch as a replacement for the VMware vNetwork Standard Switch or the VMware vNetwork Distributed Switch are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtj17451 to this vulnerability.The following Cisco products are affected:Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module Release 4.0(4) SV1(3b)Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module Release 4.0(4) SV1(3a)Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module Release 4.0(4) SV1(3)Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module Release 4.0(4) SV1(2)Cisco Nexus 1000V Virtual Ethernet Module Release 4.0(4) SV1(1)The VMware vNetwork Standard Switch and the VMware vNetwork Distributed Switch are not affected.[Editor's note: VMware has issued a security advisory. At the time of this entry, Cisco has not released a security advisory.]
CVE-2011-0355.extra: A remote user can cause the target ESX or ESXi kernel to crash.

CVE-2011-0364.title: Cisco Security Agent Web Management Interface Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0364.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Security Agent. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the web management interface on TCP port 443 to execute arbitrary code on the target system. This can be exploited to modify agent policies and the system configuration and perform other administrative tasks.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtj51216 to this vulnerability.Gerry Eisenhaur reported this vulnerability via ZDI.
CVE-2011-0364.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0372.title: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint Devices Have Flaws That Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Commands and Code
CVE-2011-0372.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Endpoint Devices. A remote user can take full control of the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 8082 to inject commands via CGI scripts and execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0372]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtb31640 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 443 to inject commands via CGI scripts and execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0373, CVE-2011-0374, CVE-2011-0375]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCtb31685, CSCtb31659, and CSCth24671 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted TFTP GET request via UDP port 69 to obtain authentication and configuration information [CVE-2011-0376]. The information can be used to take full control of the target system. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCte43876 to this vulnerability.A remote user with the ability to spoof the IP address of a Cisco TelePresence Manager can send a specially crafted SOAP request via TCP port 8081 or 9501 to inject an invalid IP address into a configuration file to cause a critical service on the target device to crash [CVE-2011-0377]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth03605 to this vulnerability.A remote user with access to the broadcast domain of the target device can send a specially crafted XML-RPC request via TCP port 61441 or 61445 to inject arbitrary commands with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0378]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtb52587 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75754 to this vulnerability.The following Cisco TelePresence endpoint systems are affected: Cisco TelePresenceSystem 500 Series, 1300 Series, 3000 Series, and 3200 Series and Cisco TelePresence System 1000 and 1100.
CVE-2011-0372.extra: A remote user can take full control of the target device.A remote user can cause a critical service on the target device to crash.

CVE-2011-0379.title: Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0379.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80, 443, or 8080 to invoke a Java Servlet and perform administrative actions [CVE-2011-0383, CVE-2011-0384]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCtf42008 and CSCtf01253 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80 or 443 to upload an arbitrary file to the target device [CVE-2011-0385]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth61065 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75766 to this vulnerability. A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to the target device on TCP port 80 or 443 to access a servlet and cause denial of service conditions on the target device [CVE-2011-0387]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97164 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to the target system on TCP port 8999 to trigger an out-of-memory error on a Java RMI servlet [CVE-2011-0388]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg35825 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted Real-Time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) packet to a listening RTCP control port to crash the call control process [CVE-2011-0389]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth60993 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted XML-RPC data to the target device on TCP port 9000 to trigger a crash of the call geometry process and cause the device tobecome unusable for future calls [CVE-2011-0390]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtj44534 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0379.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote or remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-0379.title: Cisco TelePresence Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Invoke SOAP Methods, Inject Arbitrary Commands, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0379.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can invoke arbitrary methods via the SOAP interface. A remote user can inject arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.A remote user can send a specially crafted SOAP request on TCP port 8080 or 8443 to bypass authentication and invoke arbitrary methods [CVE-2011-0380]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtc59562 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data on TCP port 1100 or 32000 to inject commands into the Java RMI interface with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0381]. The user can take control of the target device. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97085 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75761 to this vulnerability.The CDP buffer overflow affects other Cisco TelePresence products.
CVE-2011-0379.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can invoke arbitrary SOAP methods.A remote user can inject arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-0379.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Take Full Control of the Target Device
CVE-2011-0379.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Recording Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can take full control of the target device.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80, 443, or 8080 to invoke a Java Servlet and perform administrative actions [CVE-2011-0383]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf42005 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 443 to inject commands via CGI scripts and execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0382]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97221 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80 or 443 to upload an arbitrary file to the target device [CVE-2011-0385]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth85786 to this vulnerability. A remote user can send specially crafted XML-RPC data via TCP port 12102 or 12104 to overwrite arbitrary files with logging data [CVE-2011-0386]. This can be exploited to obtain full control of the target system. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCti50739 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75769 to this vulnerability. A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 80 to cause all Ad Hoc recording and playback threads on the device to be consumed [CVE-2011-0391]. A manual restart of the device may be required to return the system to normal operations. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97205 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to the target system on TCP port 8999 to trigger an out-of-memory error on a Java RMI servlet [CVE-2011-0388]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg35830 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted XML-RPC data to the target device on TCP port 8080 to perform administrative actions [CVE-2011-0392]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg35833 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0379.extra: A remote user can take full control of the target system.A remote user can cause a critical service on the target device to crash.A remote user can cause target device to become unavailable.

Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97085 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75761 to this vulnerability.The CDP buffer overflow affects other Cisco TelePresence products.
CVE-2011-0381.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can invoke arbitrary SOAP methods.A remote user can inject arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-0382.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Take Full Control of the Target Device
CVE-2011-0382.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Recording Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can take full control of the target device.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80, 443, or 8080 to invoke a Java Servlet and perform administrative actions [CVE-2011-0383]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf42005 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 443 to inject commands via CGI scripts and execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0382]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97221 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target system on TCP port 80 or 443 to upload an arbitrary file to the target device [CVE-2011-0385]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth85786 to this vulnerability. A remote user can send specially crafted XML-RPC data via TCP port 12102 or 12104 to overwrite arbitrary files with logging data [CVE-2011-0386]. This can be exploited to obtain full control of the target system. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCti50739 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0379]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd75769 to this vulnerability. A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 80 to cause all Ad Hoc recording and playback threads on the device to be consumed [CVE-2011-0391]. A manual restart of the device may be required to return the system to normal operations. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf97205 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to the target system on TCP port 8999 to trigger an out-of-memory error on a Java RMI servlet [CVE-2011-0388]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg35830 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted XML-RPC data to the target device on TCP port 8080 to perform administrative actions [CVE-2011-0392]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg35833 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0382.extra: A remote user can take full control of the target system.A remote user can cause a critical service on the target device to crash.A remote user can cause target device to become unavailable.

CVE-2011-0393.title: Cisco ASA 5500 Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Access Files on the Target Device
CVE-2011-0393.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA 5500. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can access files on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 data to a device that is not configured for IPv6 to exhaust the packet buffers and cause the target device to stop forwarding traffic [CVE-2011-0393]. Systems configured for transparent firewall mode are affected. IPv6 data traversing the device does not affect the device.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtj04707 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SCCP message through the device to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2011-0394]. Systems with SCCP inspection enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg69457 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send valid RIP updates to cause the device to reload [CVE-2011-0395]. Systems with both RIP and the Cisco Phone Proxy feature enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg66583 to this vulnerability.When the device is configured as a local CA server, a remote user can access a file system (e.g., flash:, disk0:, disk1:), which may contain sensitive information such as passwords, shared secrets, software images, and digital certificates [CVE-2011-0396]. The 'system:' file system cannot be accessed.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtk12352 to this vulnerability.Cisco PIX 500 Series Security Appliances are affected by the buffer exhaustion and SCCP inspection vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0393.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload or stop processing traffic.A remote user can access potentially sensitive files on the filesystem.
