CVE-2011-0394.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module SCCP Inspection Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0394.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Firewall Services Module. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted Skinny Client Control Protocol (SCCP) data through the target device to cause the device to reload. Systems with SCCP inspection enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtl84952 to this vulnerability.The FWSM for Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switches and Cisco 7600 Series Routers is affected.
CVE-2011-0394.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2011-0395.title: Cisco ASA 5500 Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Access Files on the Target Device
CVE-2011-0395.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA 5500. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can access files on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 data to a device that is not configured for IPv6 to exhaust the packet buffers and cause the target device to stop forwarding traffic [CVE-2011-0393]. Systems configured for transparent firewall mode are affected. IPv6 data traversing the device does not affect the device.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtj04707 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SCCP message through the device to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2011-0394]. Systems with SCCP inspection enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg69457 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send valid RIP updates to cause the device to reload [CVE-2011-0395]. Systems with both RIP and the Cisco Phone Proxy feature enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg66583 to this vulnerability.When the device is configured as a local CA server, a remote user can access a file system (e.g., flash:, disk0:, disk1:), which may contain sensitive information such as passwords, shared secrets, software images, and digital certificates [CVE-2011-0396]. The 'system:' file system cannot be accessed.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtk12352 to this vulnerability.Cisco PIX 500 Series Security Appliances are affected by the buffer exhaustion and SCCP inspection vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0395.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload or stop processing traffic.A remote user can access potentially sensitive files on the filesystem.

CVE-2011-0396.title: Cisco ASA 5500 Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Access Files on the Target Device
CVE-2011-0396.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA 5500. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can access files on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 data to a device that is not configured for IPv6 to exhaust the packet buffers and cause the target device to stop forwarding traffic [CVE-2011-0393]. Systems configured for transparent firewall mode are affected. IPv6 data traversing the device does not affect the device.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtj04707 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SCCP message through the device to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2011-0394]. Systems with SCCP inspection enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg69457 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send valid RIP updates to cause the device to reload [CVE-2011-0395]. Systems with both RIP and the Cisco Phone Proxy feature enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtg66583 to this vulnerability.When the device is configured as a local CA server, a remote user can access a file system (e.g., flash:, disk0:, disk1:), which may contain sensitive information such as passwords, shared secrets, software images, and digital certificates [CVE-2011-0396]. The 'system:' file system cannot be accessed.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtk12352 to this vulnerability.Cisco PIX 500 Series Security Appliances are affected by the buffer exhaustion and SCCP inspection vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0396.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload or stop processing traffic.A remote user can access potentially sensitive files on the filesystem.

CVE-2011-0404.title: NetSupport Manager Agent Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0404.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetSupport Manager Agent. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target system at TCP port 5405 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.ikkisoft.com/stuff/netsupport_linux.txtNetsupport Manager for Windows v11.00 is not affected.Luca Carettoni reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0404.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0408.title: libpng Memory Corruption Error in png_do_rgb_to_gray() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0408.body: A vulnerability was reported in libpng. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PNG file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Glenn Randers-Pehrson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0408.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0411.title: Postfix Plaintext to TLS Switching Error Lets Remote Users Inject Plaintext Commands
CVE-2011-0411.body: A vulnerability was reported in Postfix. A remote user can inject plaintext commands.A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can inject arbitrary plaintext before the SMTP connection switches to SMTP over TLS. The plaintext will be interpreted by the remote mail server as potential commands.Wietse Venema reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0411.extra: A remote user can inject plaintext commands.

CVE-2011-0413.title: ISC DHCPv6 Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0413.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted message for an address that was previously declined and internally tagged as abandoned to trigger an assert failure and cause the target DHCPv6 service to crash.DHCPv4 servers are not affected.
CVE-2011-0413.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-0414.title: BIND IXFR Transfer/DDNS Update Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0414.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a query when the target authoritative server processes a successful IXFR transfer or a dynamic update to trigger a deadlock and cause the server to stop processing all requests.Neustar reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0414.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to stop processing requests.

CVE-2011-0419.title: Apache APR Library apr_fnmatch() Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0419.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger recursive string matching in the Apache Portable Runtime library's apr_fnmatch() function and cause the target service to consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.Systems with mod_autoindex enabled and with a directory indexed by mod_autoindex and containing files with sufficiently long names are affected.Maksymilian Arciemowicz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0419.extra: A remote user can cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system.

CVE-2011-0426.title: VMware vCenter Discloses File to Remote Users and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0426.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware vCenter. A remote user can view files on the target system. A local user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can download files from target system [CVE-2011-0426]. Windows 2008-based installations are not affected.A local user can obtain the SOAP session ID an potentially gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1788]. VCenter versions 4.0 and 4.1 are affected. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.The vSphere Client Installer package is not digitally signed [CVE-2011-1789]. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0426.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A local user can gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-0427.title: Tor Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service and Let Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-0427.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Tor. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted z-lib compressed data to cause denial of service conditions. 'doorss' reported this vulnerability.A local user with certain privileges can access potentially sensitive information from memory. 'cypherpunks' reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0427.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0430.title: OpenAFS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code
CVE-2011-0430.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenAFS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code.A remote user can send specially crafted ASN1-encoded data to trigger a double free in the Rx server process and cause the target service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0430]. Andrew Deason reported this vulnerability.A user can trigger a flaw in the kernel module error handling to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2011-0431].
CVE-2011-0430.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0431.title: OpenAFS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code
CVE-2011-0431.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenAFS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code.A remote user can send specially crafted ASN1-encoded data to trigger a double free in the Rx server process and cause the target service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0430]. Andrew Deason reported this vulnerability.A user can trigger a flaw in the kernel module error handling to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2011-0431].
CVE-2011-0431.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0442.title: EMC Avamar Discloses Potentially Sensitive Customer Information to Remote Users
CVE-2011-0442.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Avamar. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive customer information.The system may transmit potentially sensitive customer information in clear text via EMC service requests and internal customer emails.
CVE-2011-0442.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive customer information.

CVE-2011-0443.title: tinyBB Input Validation Flaw in 'id' Parameter Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2011-0443.body: A vulnerability was reported in tinyBB. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'id' parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A demonstration exploit is provided:http://[target]/index.php?page=profile&id=' or 'a'='aThe original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/15961/Aodrulez reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0443.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-0446.title: Ruby on Rails Input Validation Flaw in mail_to Helper Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0446.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The :encode => :javascript option in the mail_to helper does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted name or e-mail value to cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Rails software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Brendan Coles of IT Security Solutions and Rick Olson of Github reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0446.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Rails software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0447.title: Ruby on Rails Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Cross-Site Request Forgery Protection
CVE-2011-0447.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails. A remote user can bypass cross-site request forgery protection.A remote user can exploit certain combinations of browser plugins and HTTP redirects to cause the target user's browser to make cross-domain requests and bypass the built-in cross-site request forgery (CSRF) protection.Felix Grobert of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0447.extra: A remote user can bypass cross-site request forgery protection.

CVE-2011-0448.title: Ruby on Rails Input Validation Flaw in limit() Function Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2011-0448.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails. A remote user can inject SQL commands.On applications that use the limit() function, a remote user may be able to supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.Eaden McKee from Webforce Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0448.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-0449.title: Ruby on Rails Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Filters on Case-Insensitive Filesystems
CVE-2011-0449.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails. A remote user can bypass filters.For applications deployed on a case-insensitive filesystem, a remote user may be able to bypass filters and access ostensibly restricted templates.Jan M. Faber of supersaas reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0449.extra: A remote user can bypass filters on case-insensitive filesystems.

CVE-2011-0465.title: X xrdb Input Validation Flaw in Processing Hostname Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2011-0465.body: A vulnerability was reported in X. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted hostname values (containing shell escape characters) to the target system to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges when a display manager reads in the resource database via xrdb.Systems that set their hostname via DHCP are affected (if the dhcp client permits hostnames with illegal characters).Systems that allow remote logins via xdmcp are affected.Sebastian Krahmer from the SUSE security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0465.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0486.title: IBM Cognos Input Validation Flaw in 'cognos.cgi' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0486.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Cognos. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Cognos software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The pathinfo parameter of 'cognos.cgi' is affected.The vendor was notified on October 9, 2010.Ferenc Spala and Tamas Czigany reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0486.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Cognos software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0521.title: Linux Kernel AV7110 Driver dvb_ca_ioctl() Memory Corruption Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0521.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply a specially crafted value to trigger a memory corruption flaw in the dvb_ca_ioctl() function in 'drivers/media/dvb/ttpci/av7110_ca.c'.
CVE-2011-0521.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2011-0527.title: VMware vFabric tc Server Lets Remote Users Login Using Obfuscated Passwords
CVE-2011-0527.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware vFabric tc Server. A remote user can login using an obfuscated version of their password.If the system stores passwords used for JMX authentication in an obfuscated form, a remote user can use the password in obfuscated form (or in plain text form) to authenticate.Version 2.5.x is not affected.The SpringSource tc Server support team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0527.extra: A remote user can login using an obfuscated version of their password.

CVE-2011-0531.title: VLC Media Player MKV File Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0531.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Matroska or WebM (MKV) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Dan Rosenberg from VSR reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0531.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0532.title: Red Hat Directory Server Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0532.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send multiple simple paged search requests to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2011-0019].When multiple Red Hat Directory Server instances are configured to run under different unprivileged users, the Directory Server setup scripts set insecure permissions on the '/var/run/dirsrv/' directory [CVE-2011-0022]. A local user can modify the pid files in the directory, which may prevent Directory Server instances from starting correctly or cause the Directory Server init script to kill an arbitrary process when shutting down the Directory Server.Multiple scripts set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to an insecure value containing an empty path [CVE-2011-0532]. A local user can create a specially crafted dynamic library in a directory and then have a target user run the vulnerable scripts from the directory to gain elevated privileges.
CVE-2011-0532.extra: A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0533.title: Apache Continuum Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0533.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Continuum. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Project pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Apache Continuum software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tal Be'ery of Imperva reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0533.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Apache Continuum software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0534.title: Apache Tomcat maxHttpHeaderSize Parsing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0534.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The system does not enforce the maxHttpHeaderSize limit when parsing the request line in the NIO HTTP connector. A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause an OutOfMemoryError error.
CVE-2011-0534.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-0538.title: Wireshark pcap-ng, Nokia DCT3, LDAP, and SMB Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0538.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted pcap-ng file that, when loaded by the target user, will free an uninitialized pointer and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0538]. Huzaifa Sidhpurwala of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted Nokia DCT3 file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0713].A remote user can send a specially crafted 6LoWPAN to cause the target service to crash when running on 32-bit systems. Paul Makowski of SEI/CERT reported this vulnerability [CVE-2011-1138]. Versions 1.4.0 to 1.4.3 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP and SMB data to trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2011-1140]. joernchen of Phenoelit reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDP Filter strings to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2011-1141]. Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet's Fortiguard Labs reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A specially crafted pcap-ng file can trigger an application crash [CVE-2011-1139].Specially crafted ASN.1 CHOICE values can trigger an infinite loop in in the BER dissector [CVE-2011-1142].A specially crafted pcap file can trigger a crash in the NTLMSSP dissector [CVE-2011-1143].
CVE-2011-0538.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash or consume excessive memory.A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.

CVE-2011-0539.title: OpenSSH Legacy Certificates May Disclose Stack Contents to Remote Users
CVE-2011-0539.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH. A remote user may be able to obtain stack contents via legacy certificates.Legacy certificates generated by OpenSSH may contain data from the stack.Versions 5.6 and 5.7 are affected when generating legacy certificates using the "-t" option on the ssh-keygen CA command-line.The vendor was notified on January 26, 2011.Mateusz Kocielski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0539.extra: A remote user may be able to obtain stack contents via legacy certificates.

CVE-2011-0545.title: Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-0545.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The management GUI login page does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'username' parameter. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the LiveUpdate software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on January 17, 2010.Nikolas Sotiriu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0545.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0548.title: Symantec Brightmail Buffer Overflow in KeyView Filter Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0548.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Brightmail/Symantec Messaging Gateway. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Lotus Freelance Graphics PRZ file to cause partial denial of service conditions.The vulnerability resides in the Autonomy Verity KeyView Filter component.alino from binaryhouse.net reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2011-0548.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-0548.title: Symantec Data Loss Prevention Buffer Overflow in KeyView Filter Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0548.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Data Loss Prevention. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Lotus Freelance Graphics PRZ file to cause partial denial of service conditions.The vulnerability resides in the Autonomy Verity KeyView Filter component.The following versions are affected:Symantec Data Loss Prevention Enforce/Detection Servers for Windows 10.x and priorSymantec Data Loss Prevention Enforce/Detection Servers for Linux 10.x and priorSymantec Data Loss Prevention Endpoint Agents 10.x and priorSymantec Data Loss Prevention Enforce/Detection Servers for Windows 11.xSymantec Data Loss Prevention Enforce/Detection Servers for Linux 11.xSymantec Data Loss Prevention Endpoint Agents 11.xalino from binaryhouse.net reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2011-0548.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-0548.title: Symantec Mail Security Buffer Overflow in KeyView Filter Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0548.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Mail Security. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Lotus Freelance Graphics PRZ file to trigger a buffer overflow in the Verity KeyView Filter and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in the Autonomy Verity KeyView Filter component.The following versions are affected:Symantec Mail Security for Microsoft Exchange 6.xSymantec Mail Security for Domino 8.xSymantec Mail Security for Domino 7.5.xalino from binaryhouse.net reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2011-0548.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0549.title: Symantec Web Gateway Input Validation Flaw in 'forget.php' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2011-0549.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Web Gateway. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The management GUI does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'username' parameter of 'forget.php' is affected (via POST request).The vendor was notified on April 1, 2011.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0549.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-0550.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-0550.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Sow Ching Shiong (via Secunia Labs) reported both vulnerabilities. Sachin Shinde(Cons0ul) also reported the cross-site scripting vulnerability.[Editor's note: The vendor originally reported that Symantec Endpoint Protection version 12.x is not affected. In January 2012, the vendor issued advisory SYM12-001 to report that version 12.1 is indeed affected.]
CVE-2011-0550.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0551.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-0551.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Sow Ching Shiong (via Secunia Labs) reported both vulnerabilities. Sachin Shinde(Cons0ul) also reported the cross-site scripting vulnerability.[Editor's note: The vendor originally reported that Symantec Endpoint Protection version 12.x is not affected. In January 2012, the vendor issued advisory SYM12-001 to report that version 12.1 is indeed affected.]
CVE-2011-0551.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0552.title: Symantec IM Manager Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Code Execution Attacks
CVE-2011-0552.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec IM Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0552]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Symantec IM Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The refreshRateSetting parameter in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminSystemDashboard.asp' is affected. The nav and menuitem parameters in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminTOC_simple.asp'. The action parameter in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminEdituser.asp' is affected.Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability via Secunia Research.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-0553].Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability via Secunia Research.A remote user can inject code via the Administrator Console [CVE-2011-0554].Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's ZeroDay Initiative.
CVE-2011-0552.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Symantec IM Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can inject arbitrary code.

CVE-2011-0553.title: Symantec IM Manager Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Code Execution Attacks
CVE-2011-0553.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec IM Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0552]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Symantec IM Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The refreshRateSetting parameter in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminSystemDashboard.asp' is affected. The nav and menuitem parameters in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminTOC_simple.asp'. The action parameter in 'IMManager/Admin/IMAdminEdituser.asp' is affected.Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability via Secunia Research.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-0553].Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability via Secunia Research.A remote user can inject code via the Administrator Console [CVE-2011-0554].Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's ZeroDay Initiative.
CVE-2011-0553.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Symantec IM Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can inject arbitrary code.

CVE-2011-0555.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0555.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0555.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0563.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-4091, CVE-2011-0562, CVE-2011-0563, CVE-2011-0565, CVE-2011-0566, CVE-2011-0567, CVE-2011-0568 (on Mac OS X only), CVE-2011-0570, CVE-2011-0585, CVE-2011-0586, CVE-2011-0588, CVE-2011-0589, CVE-2011-0590, CVE-2011-0591, CVE-2011-0592, CVE-2011-0593, CVE-2011-0594, CVE-2011-0595, CVE-2011-0596, CVE-2011-0598, CVE-2011-0599, CVE-2011-0600, CVE-2011-0602, CVE-2011-0603, CVE-2011-0605, CVE-2011-0606]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A local user on Windows-based systems can exploit a file permissions flaw to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0564].A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2011-0587, CVE-2011-0604].Mitja Kolsek of ACROS Security, Bing Liu and Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Tavis Ormandy and Billy Rios of the Google Security Team, Abdullah Ada via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, James Quirk of Los Alamos, New Mexico, Brett Gervasoni of Sense of Security, Joe Schatz of United States Senate, Office of the Sergeant at Arms, IT Security, Parvez Anwar, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, CESG, Peter Vreugdenhil via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Sebastian Apelt via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, el via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Sean Larsson, iDefense Labs, Will Dormann of CERT, Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat Security Response Team, and an anonymous reporter via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2011-0580.title: Adobe ColdFusion Flaws Permit Remote Session Hijacking, Cross-Site Scripting, and Information Disclosure
CVE-2011-0580.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The administrator console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0580, CVE-2011-0583]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply specially crafted tags to inject arbitrary headers [CVE-2011-0581].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the ColdFusion administrator console [CVE-2011-0582].A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack user sessions [CVE-2011-0584].Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd, HongZhen Zhou of McAfee, Tenable Network Security, Bogdan Calin, Michael Dominice, Pete Freitag of Foundeo, Tom Sellers of FadedCode, Chad Armond, and Jason Dean of 12robots reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0580.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can hijack user sessions.

The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply specially crafted tags to inject arbitrary headers [CVE-2011-0581].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the ColdFusion administrator console [CVE-2011-0582].A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack user sessions [CVE-2011-0584].Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd, HongZhen Zhou of McAfee, Tenable Network Security, Bogdan Calin, Michael Dominice, Pete Freitag of Foundeo, Tom Sellers of FadedCode, Chad Armond, and Jason Dean of 12robots reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0581.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can hijack user sessions.

CVE-2011-0583.title: Adobe ColdFusion Flaws Permit Remote Session Hijacking, Cross-Site Scripting, and Information Disclosure
CVE-2011-0583.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The administrator console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0580, CVE-2011-0583]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply specially crafted tags to inject arbitrary headers [CVE-2011-0581].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the ColdFusion administrator console [CVE-2011-0582].A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack user sessions [CVE-2011-0584].Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd, HongZhen Zhou of McAfee, Tenable Network Security, Bogdan Calin, Michael Dominice, Pete Freitag of Foundeo, Tom Sellers of FadedCode, Chad Armond, and Jason Dean of 12robots reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0583.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can hijack user sessions.

CVE-2011-0586.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0586.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-4091, CVE-2011-0562, CVE-2011-0563, CVE-2011-0565, CVE-2011-0566, CVE-2011-0567, CVE-2011-0568 (on Mac OS X only), CVE-2011-0570, CVE-2011-0585, CVE-2011-0586, CVE-2011-0588, CVE-2011-0589, CVE-2011-0590, CVE-2011-0591, CVE-2011-0592, CVE-2011-0593, CVE-2011-0594, CVE-2011-0595, CVE-2011-0596, CVE-2011-0598, CVE-2011-0599, CVE-2011-0600, CVE-2011-0602, CVE-2011-0603, CVE-2011-0605, CVE-2011-0606]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A local user on Windows-based systems can exploit a file permissions flaw to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-0564].A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2011-0587, CVE-2011-0604].Mitja Kolsek of ACROS Security, Bing Liu and Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Tavis Ormandy and Billy Rios of the Google Security Team, Abdullah Ada via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, James Quirk of Los Alamos, New Mexico, Brett Gervasoni of Sense of Security, Joe Schatz of United States Senate, Office of the Sergeant at Arms, IT Security, Parvez Anwar, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, CESG, Peter Vreugdenhil via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Sebastian Apelt via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, el via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Sean Larsson, iDefense Labs, Will Dormann of CERT, Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat Security Response Team, and an anonymous reporter via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2011-0607.title: Adobe Flash Player Flaws Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0607.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Vitaliy Toropov (via iDefense), an Anonymous Researcher (via iDefense), Will Dormann of CERT, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Raner of ACROS Security, Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat Security Response Team, an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0607.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0608.title: Adobe Flash Player Flaws Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0608.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Vitaliy Toropov (via iDefense), an Anonymous Researcher (via iDefense), Will Dormann of CERT, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Raner of ACROS Security, Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat Security Response Team, an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0608.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0611.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader 'Authplay.dll' Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0611.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'Authplay.dll' component is affected.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.The vendor reports that Protected Mode in Adobe Reader version 10.x for Windows prevents exploitation.Mila Parkour reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0611.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0611.title: Adobe Flash Player Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0611.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Flash (.swf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This vulnerability is being actively exploited via an e-mailed Microsoft Word document embedded with a Flash file.Mila Parkour reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0611.extra: A remote user can create Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0636.title: NVIDIA CUDA Driver Toolkit Discloses Information to Local Users
CVE-2011-0636.body: A vulnerability was reported in NVIDIA CUDA Driver Toolkit. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The driver does not properly initialize memory. A local user can read portions of kernel memory.Alex Granovsky of Firefly Project reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0636.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory.

CVE-2011-0654.title: Windows Server Message Block Parsing Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0654.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Server Message Block. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Computer Browser message to trigger a parsing error in the target client's CIFS Browser Protocol implementation and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0654]. The code will run with the System-level privileges.A remote user can send a specially crafted SMB response to the connect client to trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0660].
CVE-2011-0654.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0655.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0655.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft PowerPoint Web App is also affected.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0655.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0656.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0656.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft PowerPoint Web App is also affected.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0656.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0657.title: Windows DNS Resolution LLMNR Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0657.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows DNS resolution. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted Link-local Multicast Name Resolution (LLMNR) broadcast queries to trigger a flaw in 'DNSAPI.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with NetworkService privileges.Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, and Windows Server 2008 R2 are affected.On Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, a local user can exploit this flaw to gain elevated (NetworkService) privileges.Neel Mehta of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0657.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with NetworkService privileges.A local user can obtain NetworkService privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0660.title: Windows Server Message Block Parsing Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0660.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Server Message Block. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Computer Browser message to trigger a parsing error in the target client's CIFS Browser Protocol implementation and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0654]. The code will run with the System-level privileges.A remote user can send a specially crafted SMB response to the connect client to trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-0660].
CVE-2011-0660.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0661.title: Windows SMB Server Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0661.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Server Message Block (SMB) Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SMB request to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2011-0661.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0662.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0662.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0662.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0663.title: Microsoft JScript and VBScript Engine Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0663.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft JScript/VBScript. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause a memory reallocation error and trigger an integer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jesse Ruderman of Mozilla reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0663.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0665.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0665.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0665.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0666.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0666.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0666.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0667.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0667.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0667.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-0670.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0670.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.

A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2011-0675.title: Windows Kernel win32k.sys Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-0675.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
