CVE-2011-0688.title: Symantec Antivirus Corporate Edition Intel AMS Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0688.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the Intel Alert Management System service on TCP port 38292 to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in the third party Intel Alert Management System(AMS2).An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Junaid Bohio of Vulnerability Research Team, Telus Security Labs, and Jorge Lucangeli Obes of CORE Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0688.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0707.title: Mailman Input Validation Flaw in Full Name Field Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0707.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mailman. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the Full Name field before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted Full Name value to cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Mailman software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following confirmation dialogs are affected:"Confirm unsubscription request" screen"Confirm change of email address request" screen"Re-enable mailing list membership" screenThe vulnerability resides in 'Mailman/Cgi/confirm.py'.
CVE-2011-0707.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Mailman software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0713.title: Wireshark pcap-ng, Nokia DCT3, LDAP, and SMB Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0713.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted pcap-ng file that, when loaded by the target user, will free an uninitialized pointer and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0538]. Huzaifa Sidhpurwala of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted Nokia DCT3 file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0713].A remote user can send a specially crafted 6LoWPAN to cause the target service to crash when running on 32-bit systems. Paul Makowski of SEI/CERT reported this vulnerability [CVE-2011-1138]. Versions 1.4.0 to 1.4.3 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP and SMB data to trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2011-1140]. joernchen of Phenoelit reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDP Filter strings to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2011-1141]. Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet's Fortiguard Labs reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A specially crafted pcap-ng file can trigger an application crash [CVE-2011-1139].Specially crafted ASN.1 CHOICE values can trigger an infinite loop in in the BER dissector [CVE-2011-1142].A specially crafted pcap file can trigger a crash in the NTLMSSP dissector [CVE-2011-1143].
CVE-2011-0713.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash or consume excessive memory.A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.

CVE-2011-0718.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Session Fixation and Brute Force Password Guessing Attacks
CVE-2011-0718.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Network Satellite Server. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can conduct brute force password guessing attacks.A remote user can preset a session cookie in the target user's browser to hijack the target user's session at the next login [CVE-2011-0717].The server does not enforce a time delay after a failed login attempt [CVE-2011-0718]. A remote user can conduct brute force guessing attacks without delay.Thomas Biege of the SuSE Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0718.extra: A remote user can hijack user sessions.A remote user can conduct brute force password guessing attacks.

CVE-2011-0719.title: Samba FD_SET Stack Corruption Flaw Lets Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-0719.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A local user, remote authenticated user, or remote guest user can cause denial of service conditions.The FD_SET macro does not implement range checks on file descriptors. A local user, remote authenticated user, or remote guest user can corrupt the stack to cause Samba to crash or enter an infinite loop.Volker Lendecke of SerNet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0719.extra: A local user, remote authenticated user, or remote guest user can cause the service to crash or enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2011-0725.title: Aptdaemon Security Bypass Lets Local Users View Files
CVE-2011-0725.body: A vulnerability was reported in Aptdaemon. A local user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly filter certain arguments when using its D-Bus interface. A local user can bypass security restrictions to view arbitrary files on the target system.Sergey Nizovtsev reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0725.extra: A local user can view the contents of files on the target system.

CVE-2011-0733.title: Adobe ColdFusion Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0733.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to obtain information about the target page's SQL query and the page's installation path.A demonstration exploit is provided:http://[target]/page.cfm?id=-A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/page.cfm?id=%3Cbody%20onload=alert(document.cookie)%3EThe vendor was notified on November 16, 2010.MustLive reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: A user has reported testing this on several servers and applications and being unable to reproduce the vulnerability.]
CVE-2011-0733.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-0734.title: Adobe ColdFusion Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0734.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to obtain information about the target page's SQL query and the page's installation path.A demonstration exploit is provided:http://[target]/page.cfm?id=-A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/page.cfm?id=%3Cbody%20onload=alert(document.cookie)%3EThe vendor was notified on November 16, 2010.MustLive reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: A user has reported testing this on several servers and applications and being unable to reproduce the vulnerability.]
CVE-2011-0734.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-0742.title: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0742.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell ZENworks Handheld Management. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to 'ZfHIPCND.exe' on TCP port 2400 to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Junaid Bohio, Vulnerability Research Team, TELUS Security Labs reported this vulnerability. AbdulAziz Hariri also reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2011-0742.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0745.title: SugarCRM Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass 'List' Restrictions
CVE-2011-0745.body: A vulnerability was reported in SugarCRM. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target application.A remote authenticated user can bypass list privilege restrictions to list all entries and view customer names and contact information.Some demonstration exploit URLs are provided:http://[target]/sugarcrm/index.php?module=Accounts&action=ShowDuplicateshttp://[target]/sugarcrm/index.php?module=Contacts&action=ShowDuplicatesSugarCRM Community Edition, SugarCRM Professional, and SugarCRM Enterprise are affected.The vendor was notified on February 9, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.redteam-pentesting.de/advisories/rt-sa-2011-002RedTeam Pentesting GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0745.extra: A remote authenticated user can list all entries and view customer names and contact information.

CVE-2011-0758.title: CA Secure Content Manager Heap Overflow in 'ECSQdmn.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0758.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Secure Content Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the eTrust Common Services Transport service (ECSQdmn.exe) on port 1882 to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on May 23, 2008.Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-11-059
CVE-2011-0758.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0764.title: Xpdf Memory Corruption Errors in t1lib Library Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0764.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Type 1 font that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in the t1lib library and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.toucan-system.com/advisories/tssa-2011-01.txtJonathan Brossard from Toucan System reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0764.extra: A remote user can create a font that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0770.title: HP ArcSight Connectors Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0770.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP ArcSight Connectors. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Windows Event Log SmartConnector does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in imported files before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted report file that, when imported for editing by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the HP ArcSight Connectors appliance and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Michael Rutkowski of Duer Advanced Technology and Aerospace, Inc (DATA) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0770.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the HP ArcSight Connectors device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0890.title: HP Discovery & Dependency Mapping Inventory (DDMI) Configuration Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain SNMP
CVE-2011-0890.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Discovery & Dependency Mapping Inventory (DDMI). A remote user can access information via SNMP.A remote user can gain read-only SNMP access.
CVE-2011-0890.extra: A remote user can access information via SNMP.

CVE-2011-0892.title: HP Diagnostics Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0892.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Diagnostics. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Diagnostics software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2011-0892.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Diagnostics software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0893.title: HP Operations for UNIX Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Unauthorized Access
CVE-2011-0893.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Operations for UNIX. A remote authenticated user can gain unauthorized access. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.No details were provided.
CVE-2011-0893.extra: A remote authenticated user can partially view and modify data on the target application.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Operations for UNIX software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0898.title: HP Network Node Manager i Lets Local Users Access Files and Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-0898.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi). A local user can access files on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user can access files on the target system [CVE-2011-0897].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-0898]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP OpenView software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2011-0898.extra: A local user can access files on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP OpenView software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-0925.title: Cisco Secure Desktop CSDWebInstaller Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0925.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Secure Desktop. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the CSDWebInstaller.ocx ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system because the system fails to verify the digital signature of the executable file [CVE-2011-0926]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can also rename Cisco-signed executable file to 'inst.exe', host it remotely, and exploit flaws in the file to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2011-0925].The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 705EC6D4-B138-4079-A307-EF13E4889A82The vendor was notified on September 14, 2010 and August 25, 2010, respectively.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0925.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0926.title: Cisco Secure Desktop CSDWebInstaller Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0926.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Secure Desktop. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the CSDWebInstaller.ocx ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system because the system fails to verify the digital signature of the executable file [CVE-2011-0926]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can also rename Cisco-signed executable file to 'inst.exe', host it remotely, and exploit flaws in the file to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2011-0925].The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 705EC6D4-B138-4079-A307-EF13E4889A82The vendor was notified on September 14, 2010 and August 25, 2010, respectively.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0926.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0963.title: Cisco NAC Guest Server Configuration Error Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Access the Network
CVE-2011-0963.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NAC Guest Server. A remote user can access the ostensibly protected network.A remote user can exploit a configuration error in the RADIUS authentication software to bypass authentication and access the protected network.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtj66922 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0963.extra: A remote user can access the protected network.

CVE-2011-0976.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0976.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft PowerPoint Web App is also affected.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0976.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0977.title: Microsoft Office DLL Loading and Graphic Object Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0977.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted DLL file on a remote share (e.g., WebDAV, SMB share). When the target application is loaded by the target user and the target user opens an Office-related on that remote share, the application may load the remote user's DLL instead of the intended DLL and execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This type of exploit is also known as "binary planting" or "DLL preloading".A remote user can create a Microsoft Office file containing specially crafted graphic objects that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a data structure dereferencing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-0977.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can may be able to cause a target application to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0978.title: Microsoft Excel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0978.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Muhammad Junaid Bohio of Telus Security Labs, Aniway (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0978.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0979.title: Microsoft Excel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0979.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Muhammad Junaid Bohio of Telus Security Labs, Aniway (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0979.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0980.title: Microsoft Excel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0980.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office XP SP3, 2003 SP3, 2007 SP2, and 2010 are also affected.Microsoft Office 2004 for Mac, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac, Microsoft Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac are also affected.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Muhammad Junaid Bohio of Telus Security Labs, Aniway (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-0980.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-0994.title: Novell File Reporter Agent XML Parsing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0994.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell File Reporter. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted XML data to the 'NFRAgent.exe' agent on TCP port 3037 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on October 6, 2010.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2011-0994.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-0997.title: ISC DHCP Meta-Character Filtering Flaw in dhclient Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-0997.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote DHCP server can return specially crafted hostname field meta-characters to cause the connected dhclient to execute arbitrary commands.Sebastian Krahmer and Marius Tomaschewski of the SUSE Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-0997.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1003.title: Clam AntiVirus Double Free in vba_read_project_strings() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1003.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a double free in vba_read_project_strings() and cause the target service to crash.The vulnerability resides in 'libclamav/vba_extract.c'.Torok Edwin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1003.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-1006.title: libcgroup Controller List Heap Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1006.body: A vulnerability was reported in libcgroup. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can create a specially crafted controller list to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.Nelson Elhage reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1006.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1011.title: policycoreutils 'seunshare' Directory Permission Settings Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1011.body: A vulnerability was reported in policycoreutils. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The 'seunshare' utility does not enforce proper file permissions on the directory used as an alternate to the '/tmp' directory. A local user can exploit this to overwrite files and potentially execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.Tavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1011.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1015.title: Python CGIHTTPServer Lets Remote Users View CGI Source Code
CVE-2011-1015.body: A vulnerability was reported in Python. A remote user can view CGI source code.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request without the leading '/' character to the CGIHTTPServer to view the requested CGI source code.
CVE-2011-1015.extra: A remote user can view CGI source code.

CVE-2011-1017.title: Linux Kernel Buffer Overflow in ldm_frag_add() May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1017.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A physically local user can connect a storage device with a specially crafted LDM partition table to trigger a buffer overflow in the ldm_frag_add() function in 'fs/partitions/ldm.c' and potentially execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.The original advisory is available at:http://www.pre-cert.de/advisories/PRE-SA-2011-01.txtTimo Warns (PRESENSE Technologies GmbH) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1017.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1018.title: LogWatch Filename Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1018.body: A vulnerability was reported in LogWatch. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.The software passes data from log file names to the shell without proper input validation. A remote user can create a specially crafted log file that, when processed via logwatch by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root level privileges.
CVE-2011-1018.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.

CVE-2011-1022.title: libcgroup Lets Local Users Spoof NETLINK Messages
CVE-2011-1022.body: A vulnerability was reported in libcgroup. A local user can enable processes to run with additional resources.The software does not validate the origin of Netlink messages. A local user can send specially crafted Netlink messages to the cgrulesengd daemon to place processes into certain control groups, potentially allowing the processes to run with additional resources.The vulnerability resides in 'src/daemon/cgrulesengd.c'.
CVE-2011-1022.extra: A local user can enable processes to run with additional resources.

CVE-2011-1024.title: OpenLDAP Forwarding Error May Let Remote Users Bypass Authentication for External Applications
CVE-2011-1024.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user may be able to bypass authentication for external applications.When the system is configured with a chain overlay on the frontend and with ppolicy with ppolicy_forward_updates, the system will accept bind operations with invalid credentials. If an OpenLDAP slave receives an authenticated bind request with an invalid password that was forwarded to the master LDAP server, the LDAP slave will return a successful bind (as an anonymous user).A remote user may be able login to external applications (e.g., pam_ldap, SSSD) using an invalid password.
CVE-2011-1024.extra: A remote user may be able login to external applications (e.g., pam_ldap, SSSD) using an invalid password.

CVE-2011-1025.title: OpenLDAP back-ndb Lets Remote Users Authenticate Without a Valid Password
CVE-2011-1025.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user can authenticate without a valid password.A remote user with knowledge of the target distinguished name can provide an arbitrary password to successfully authenticate on systems using the NDB back-end.
CVE-2011-1025.extra: A remote user can authenticate without a valid password.

CVE-2011-1030.title: IBM Lotus Connections Input Validation Hole in Wikis Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1030.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Connections. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Lotus Connections software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Connections Wikis, Confirm New Page scene is affected.
CVE-2011-1030.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Lotus Connections software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1034.title: IBM Rational Build Forge Input Validation Flaw in User Interface Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1034.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational Build Forge. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The user interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Rational Build Forge software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'mod' parameter of '/fullcontrol' is affected.
CVE-2011-1034.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Rational Build Forge software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1071.title: Glibc Memory Corruption Flaw in fnmatch() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1071.body: A vulnerability was reported in glibc. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted UTF8 data to an application that uses the fnmatch() function to potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2011-1071.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1076.title: Linux Kernel dns_resolver Key Processing Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1076.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.When a DNS resolver key is instantiated with an error indication, a local user can attempt to read the key to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause a kernel crash.
CVE-2011-1076.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2011-1081.title: OpenLDAP modrdn Request Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1081.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted modrdn request with an empty old RDN value to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2011-1081.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-1090.title: Linux Kernel NFSv4 ACL Allocation Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1090.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user that owns files on an NFSv4 share can cause an access control list memory error and trigger a kernel panic.
CVE-2011-1090.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2011-1095.title: Glibc Locale Command May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1095.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The locale command does not properly escape user-supplied output. A local user with the ability to set the local environment variables of a script that performs shell evaluation of the output of the locale command may be able to cause arbitrary commands to be executed by the target script. The commands will run with the privileges of the target script.Harald van Dijk reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1095.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1097.title: Rsync Checksum Mismatch Error Lets Remote Servers Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1097.body: A vulnerability was reported in Rsync. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote rsync server can return specially crafted data to the connected target client to trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target client system. The code will run with the privileges of the target client user or application.The vulnerability can be triggered when the rsync client uses the "--recursive" and"--delete" options without the "--owner" option.Wayne Davison and Matt McCutchen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1097.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the target client system.

CVE-2011-1102.title: F-Secure Policy Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1102.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Policy Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine the installation path.The WebReporting module does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the F-Secure Policy Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1102.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the F-Secure Policy Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-1103.title: F-Secure Policy Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1103.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Policy Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine the installation path.The WebReporting module does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the F-Secure Policy Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.Sow Ching Shiong reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1103.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the F-Secure Policy Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-1126.title: VMware vmrun Utility Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1126.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On systems with certain non-standard filesystem configurations, a local user can place a specially crafted file into a predefined library path to cause vmrun to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.The following versions are affected:VMware VIX API for Linux 1.10.2 and earlierVMware Workstation 7.1.3 on Linux and earlierVMware Workstation 6.5.5 on Linux and earlierTim Brown reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1126.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1138.title: Wireshark pcap-ng, Nokia DCT3, LDAP, and SMB Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1138.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted pcap-ng file that, when loaded by the target user, will free an uninitialized pointer and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0538]. Huzaifa Sidhpurwala of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted Nokia DCT3 file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-0713].A remote user can send a specially crafted 6LoWPAN to cause the target service to crash when running on 32-bit systems. Paul Makowski of SEI/CERT reported this vulnerability [CVE-2011-1138]. Versions 1.4.0 to 1.4.3 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP and SMB data to trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2011-1140]. joernchen of Phenoelit reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDP Filter strings to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2011-1141]. Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet's Fortiguard Labs reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A specially crafted pcap-ng file can trigger an application crash [CVE-2011-1139].Specially crafted ASN.1 CHOICE values can trigger an infinite loop in in the BER dissector [CVE-2011-1142].A specially crafted pcap file can trigger a crash in the NTLMSSP dissector [CVE-2011-1143].
CVE-2011-1138.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash or consume excessive memory.A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed.

Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A remote user can send specially crafted LDP Filter strings to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2011-1141]. Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet's Fortiguard Labs reported this vulnerability. Versions 1.0.x are also affected.A specially crafted pcap-ng file can trigger an application crash [CVE-2011-1139].Specially crafted ASN.1 CHOICE values can trigger an infinite loop in in the BER dissector [CVE-2011-1142].A specially crafted pcap file can trigger a crash in the NTLMSSP dissector [CVE-2011-1143].

CVE-2011-1146.title: libvirt API Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1146.body: A vulnerability was reported in libvirt. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can invoke certain API calls that do not properly enforce read-only access controls to cause the target libvirtd server to crash or potentially grant elevated privileges.The affected API calls are:- virConnectDomainXMLToNative- virNodeDeviceDettach- virNodeDeviceReAttach- virNodeDeviceReset- virDomainRevertToSnapshot- virDomainSnapshotDelete
CVE-2011-1146.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1147.title: Asterisk UDPTL Array Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1147.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted UDPTL data to trigger an array overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Systems configured for T.38 pass through or termination are affected. Matthew Nicholson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1147.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1163.title: Linux Kernel OSF Partition Table Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Obtain Information
CVE-2011-1163.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain information from kernel memory.A local user can create a storage device with specially crafted OSF partition tables. When the kernel automatically evaluates the partition tables, a buffer overflow may occur and data from kernel heap space may leak to userspace.Timo Warns (PRESENSE Technologies GmbH) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1163.extra: A local user can obtain kernel memory contents.

CVE-2011-1167.title: LibTIFF Buffer Overflow in ThunderCode Decoder Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1167.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow in the ThunderCode decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on January 21, 2011.Martin Barbella reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1167.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1168.title: KDE Konqueror Input Validation Flaw in Error Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1168.body: A vulnerability was reported in KDE Konqueror. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The error page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will potentially run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on March 16, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.nth-dimension.org.uk/pub/NDSA20110321.txt.ascTim Brown of Nth Dimension reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1168.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1174.title: Asterisk Manager Interface Bug Lets Remote Users Consume Excessive Resources
CVE-2011-1174.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user repeatedly connect to the manager interface, send invalid data, and close the connection to cause Asterisk to consume all available CPU and memory resources.The vendor was notified on Marcy 1, 2011.Blake Cornell reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1174.extra: A remote user can consume all available CPU and memory resources.

CVE-2011-1178.title: GIMP Buffer Overflow in Processing PCX Image Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1178.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PCX image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the Personal Computer eXchange (PCX) image file plug-in and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2011-1178.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1179.title: Red Hat Spice-xpi Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1179.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Spice-xpi. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Mozilla Firefox with the SPICE plug-in enabled, will load an uninitialized pointer and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-1179]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The plug-in uses a predictable name for a log file. A local user can conduct a symbolic link (symlink) attack to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the target user [CVE-2011-0012].
CVE-2011-1179.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1205.title: IBM AppScan Licensing Component Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1205.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AppScan. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via the operating system, will execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.The vulnerability resides in several COM objects provided in the licensing component.The following product versions are affected:AppScan Build Edition/Express Edition/Standard EditionAppScan Tester Edition/Reporting Console
CVE-2011-1205.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1205.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Licensing Component Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1205.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via the operating system, will execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.The vulnerability resides in several COM objects provided in the licensing component.
CVE-2011-1205.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1206.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Privileged Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1206.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Tivoli Directory Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system (APAR IO14045 and IO14046)A local user with privileges to view the audit log or server trace can obtain potentially sensitive information (APAR IO14043 and IO14044).
CVE-2011-1206.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1207.title: IBM Rational System Architect ActiveBar ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1207.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational System Architect. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit the Save(), SaveLayoutchanges(), SaveMenuUsageData() and SetLayoutData() methods in the ActiveBar ActiveX controls (actbar.ocx and actbar2.ocx) to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the ActiveBar ActiveX controls used by IBM Rational System Architect.Parvez Anwar reported this vulnerability via Secunia.
CVE-2011-1207.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1220.title: IBM Tivoli Management Framework Buffer Overflow in 'lcfd.exe' Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1220.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Management Framework. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send an HTTP request with a specially crafted opts argument that is larger than 256 bytes to trigger a stack overflow in 'lcfd.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor reports that authentication can be trivially achieved.Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1220.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1222.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Buffer Overflows in Journal Based Backup Clients Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1222.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the Windows and AIX Journal Based Backup client functions to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1222].A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the Windows backup-archive client alternate data stream processing to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1223].
CVE-2011-1222.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1223.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Buffer Overflows in Journal Based Backup Clients Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1223.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the Windows and AIX Journal Based Backup client functions to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1222].A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the Windows backup-archive client alternate data stream processing to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1223].
CVE-2011-1223.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a use-after free or null pointer dereference to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Tarjei Mandt of Norman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1229.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.
