CVE-2011-1244.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Hijack User Clicks
CVE-2011-1244.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can view content from another domain. A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An uninitialized layout object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-0094].A specially crafted frame tag can allow a remote user to obtain potentially sensitive information or conduct clickjacking attacks [CVE-2011-1244].Specially crafted javascript can allow a remote user to view content from another domain or Internet Explorer zone [CVE-2011-1245].An uninitialized memory object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-1345].An anonymous researcher (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), MITRE, David Bloom of Google Inc., and Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1244.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can view content from another domain.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.

CVE-2011-1245.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Hijack User Clicks
CVE-2011-1245.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can view content from another domain. A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An uninitialized layout object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-0094].A specially crafted frame tag can allow a remote user to obtain potentially sensitive information or conduct clickjacking attacks [CVE-2011-1244].Specially crafted javascript can allow a remote user to view content from another domain or Internet Explorer zone [CVE-2011-1245].An uninitialized memory object can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-1345].An anonymous researcher (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), MITRE, David Bloom of Google Inc., and Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1245.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can view content from another domain.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.

CVE-2011-1280.title: Microsoft SQL Server XML Editor External Entity Resolution Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1280.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SQL Server. A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Web Service Discovery (.disco) file that, when opened by the target user with the XML editor, will allow the remote user to obtain the contents of a file on the target user's system.Jesse Ou of Cigital reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1280.extra: A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.

CVE-2011-1280.title: Microsoft Office InfoPath XML Editor External Entity Resolution Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1280.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office InfoPath. A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Web Service Discovery (.disco) file that, when opened by the target user with the XML editor, will allow the remote user to obtain the contents of a file on the target user's system.Jesse Ou of Cigital reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1280.extra: A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.

CVE-2011-1280.title: Microsoft Visual Studio XML Editor External Entity Resolution Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1280.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Visual Studio. A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Web Service Discovery (.disco) file that, when opened by the target user with the XML editor, will allow the remote user to obtain the contents of a file on the target user's system.Jesse Ou of Cigital reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1280.extra: A remote user can obtain the contents of files on the target system.

CVE-2011-1290.title: Blackberry Device Software Bug in WebKit Lets Remote Users Execute Code
CVE-2011-1290.body: A vulnerability was reported in Blackberry Device Software. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.The code can access user data stored on the media card and in the built-in media storage on the BlackBerry smartphone, but not email and other personal information stored on the file system of the BlackBerry smartphone.The following devices are affected:* BlackBerry Bold 9650 smartphone* BlackBerry Bold 9700 smartphone* BlackBerry Bold 9780 smartphone* BlackBerry Curve 9300 Series* BlackBerry Pearl 9100 Series* BlackBerry Style 9670 smartphone* BlackBerry Torch 9800 smartphoneThis vulnerability was demonstrated at the Pwn2Own 2011 Contest.Vincenzo Iozzo, Ralf Philipp Weinmann, and Willem Pinckaers reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1290.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1300.title: Google Chrome Heap Overflow and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1300.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory access error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.yuri.ko616, Google Chrome Security Team (Inferno), and Christoph Diehl reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1300.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1301.title: Google Chrome Heap Overflow and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1301.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory access error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.yuri.ko616, Google Chrome Security Team (Inferno), and Christoph Diehl reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1301.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1302.title: Google Chrome Heap Overflow and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1302.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory access error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.yuri.ko616, Google Chrome Security Team (Inferno), and Christoph Diehl reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1302.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1344.title: Apple Safari Text Node Use-After-Free Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1344.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free in the processing of text nodes and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.VUPEN Security working with TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative and Martin Barbella reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1344.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1385.title: IBM AIX ICMP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1385.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted ICMP packet to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2011-1385.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-1390.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Input Validation Flaw in Maintenance Tool Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2011-1390.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The Maintenance tool does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.Jan Kaestle of Siemens AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1390.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-1398.title: PHP HTTP Response Splitting Header Injection Protection Can Be Bypassed Using Carriage Return Characters
CVE-2011-1398.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can bypass HTTP response splitting protections.A remote user can submit specially crafted data containing carriage return characters to potentially cause the target server to return a split response. A remote user may be able to exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks.
CVE-2011-1398.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.

CVE-2011-1414.title: TIBCO tibbr Input Validation Hole in Web Service Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1414.body: A vulnerability was reported in TIBCO tibbr. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The tibbr web service does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TIBCO tibbr software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2011-1414.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TIBCO tibbr software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1420.title: EMC Data Protection Advisor Collector for Solaris File Permission Error Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1420.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Data Protection Advisor Collector for Solaris. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.Some files contain incorrect permissions. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code in the context of a privileged user on the target system.Stefan Wuensch of Harvard University reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1420.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1421.title: EMC NetWorker Incorrect Permissions Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1421.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC NetWorker. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a permissions error to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.Stefan Wuensch of Harvard University reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1421.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-1422.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1422.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A Flash Shockwave file provided by the Adaptive Authentication system does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Adaptive Authentication software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2011-1422.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Adaptive Authentication software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1425.title: XML Security Library XSLT Signature Verification Bug Lets Remote Users Create or Overwrite Files on the Target System
CVE-2011-1425.body: A vulnerability was reported in XML Security Library. A remote user can create or overwrite files on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted data to cause the library to create or overwrite arbitrary files during signature verification if XSLT is enabled.Nicolas Gregoire reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1425.extra: A remote user can create or overwrite files on the target system.

CVE-2011-1475.title: Apache Tomcat HTTP BIO Connector Error Discloses Information From Different Requests to Remote Users
CVE-2011-1475.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user may be able to obtain information from a different request.When using HTTP pipelining, the system may return information from a different request to a remote user. The vulnerability resides in the HTTP BIO connector.Brad Piles reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1475.extra: A remote user may be able to obtain information from a different request.

CVE-2011-1486.title: libvirt Error Handling Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1486.body: A vulnerability was reported in libvirt. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user with the ability to establish read-only connections to the target livirtd service can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2011-1486.extra: A remote user can cause libvirtd to crash.

CVE-2011-1507.title: Asterisk Lets Remote Users Exhaust All Available File Descriptors
CVE-2011-1507.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can open a large number of connections to cause Asterisk to consume all available file descriptors and stop processing new calls.Systems that have the Asterisk Manager Interface, Skinny, SIP over TCP, or the built in HTTP server enabled are affected.Tzafrir Cohen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1507.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to stop processing new calls.

CVE-2011-1519.title: IBM Lotus Domino Server Controller Authentication Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1519.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Domino Server Controller. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the remote console to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary code on the target system. During the authentication process, the user can supply a specially crafted COOKIEFILE path value to the remote console via TCP port 2050 to cause the server to retrieve specially crafted credentials from a user-controlled location and compare the credentials in the user's authentication request against the user-controlled credentials, granting access to the system.The vendor was notified on September 23, 2010.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-11-110Patrik Karlsson reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1519.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.

CVE-2011-1521.title: Python urllib Redirection Flaw Lets Remote Servers Deny Service and Obtain Files
CVE-2011-1521.body: A vulnerability was reported in Python. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote server can return a specially crafted HTTP 302 redirect to cause the connected application to load a 'file://' resource to access a file or consume excessive resource on the connected system.The urllib and urllib2 modules are affected.
CVE-2011-1521.extra: A remote server can cause denial of service conditions on the connected application.A remote server can access files on the system running the connected application.

CVE-2011-1524.title: Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-1524.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The management GUI login page does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'username' parameter. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the LiveUpdate software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on January 17, 2010.Nikolas Sotiriu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1524.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1525.title: RealPlayer Heap Overflow in Processing IVR Files Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1525.body: A vulnerability was reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted IVR file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/real_5.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1525.extra: A remote user can create an IVR file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1530.title: Kerberos Null Pointer Dereference in process_tgs_req() Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1530.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user (principal in the target KDC's domain) can send specially crafted data to trigger a null pointer dereference in the Ticket Granting Service (TGS) request processing and cause the target KDC to crash.The vulnerability resides in the process_tgs_req() function.Simo Sorce reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1530.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target KDC to crash.

CVE-2011-1531.title: HP Photosmart Printer Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1531.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Photosmart printers. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can partially access and modify data.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1533]. The code will originate from the site running the Photosmart software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can partially access data via the printer's embedded web server [CVE-2011-1531].A remote user can partially modify data via the printer's SNMP server [CVE-2011-1532].The following printer models are affected:HP Photosmart D110 seriesHP Photosmart B110 seriesHP Photosmart Plus B210 seriesHP Photosmart Premium C310 seriesHP Photosmart Premium Fax All-in-OneHP Photosmart Premium C510 seriesHP ENVY 100 D410 seriesAaron Sigel of vtty.com reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1531.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Photosmart software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can partially access and modify data on the target system.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-1533.title: HP Photosmart Printer Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1533.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Photosmart printers. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can partially access and modify data.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1533]. The code will originate from the site running the Photosmart software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can partially access data via the printer's embedded web server [CVE-2011-1531].A remote user can partially modify data via the printer's SNMP server [CVE-2011-1532].The following printer models are affected:HP Photosmart D110 seriesHP Photosmart B110 seriesHP Photosmart Plus B210 seriesHP Photosmart Premium C310 seriesHP Photosmart Premium Fax All-in-OneHP Photosmart Premium C510 seriesHP ENVY 100 D410 seriesAaron Sigel of vtty.com reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1533.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Photosmart software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can partially access and modify data on the target system.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2011-1537.title: HP ProLiant Support Pack Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and URL Redirection Attacks and Let Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2011-1537.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP ProLiant Support Pack. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can conduct URL redirection attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-1537]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP ProLiant Support Pack software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can conduct URL redirection attacks [CVE-2011-1538].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2011-1539].ProCheckUp Ltd. reported the cross-site scripting vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1537.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP ProLiant Support Pack software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1538.title: HP ProLiant Support Pack Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and URL Redirection Attacks and Let Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2011-1538.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP ProLiant Support Pack. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can conduct URL redirection attacks [CVE-2011-1538].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2011-1539].ProCheckUp Ltd. reported the cross-site scripting vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1538.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP ProLiant Support Pack software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1542.title: HP Systems Insight Manager Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-1542.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1542]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks [CVE-2011-1543].
CVE-2011-1542.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1543.title: HP Systems Insight Manager Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-1543.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1542]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks [CVE-2011-1543].
CVE-2011-1543.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1545.title: HP Insight Control for Windows Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2011-1545.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Insight Control for Windows. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1544].A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2011-1545].
CVE-2011-1545.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1552.title: Xpdf Memory Corruption Errors in t1lib Library Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1552.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Type 1 font that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in the t1lib library and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.toucan-system.com/advisories/tssa-2011-01.txtJonathan Brossard from Toucan System reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1552.extra: A remote user can create a font that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1553.title: Xpdf Memory Corruption Errors in t1lib Library Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1553.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Type 1 font that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in the t1lib library and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.toucan-system.com/advisories/tssa-2011-01.txtJonathan Brossard from Toucan System reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1553.extra: A remote user can create a font that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1554.title: Xpdf Memory Corruption Errors in t1lib Library Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1554.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Type 1 font that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in the t1lib library and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.toucan-system.com/advisories/tssa-2011-01.txtJonathan Brossard from Toucan System reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1554.extra: A remote user can create a font that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1561.title: IBM AIX LDAP Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2011-1561.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A remote user can login with the wrong password.On systems that have installed bos.rte.security 6.1.6.4 fileset, a remote user can login with an incorrect password.When a LDAP user account authtype is set to ldap_auth in the '/etc/security/ldap/ldap.cfg' file, the account is affected.When a non-LDAP user account has their SYSTEM attribute in the '/etc/security/user' file set to SYSTEM = "LDAP or compat" or when the default stanza is set to SYSTEM = "LDAP or compat" and local users do not have their SYSTEM attribute set in their own stanza, the account is affected.
CVE-2011-1561.extra: A remote user can login with the wrong password.

CVE-2011-1574.title: GStreamer Stack Overflow (libmodplug) in Processing S3M Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1574.body: A vulnerability was reported in GStreamer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted S3M file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'libmodplug'.The original advisory is available at:https://www.sec-consult.com/files/20110407-0_libmodplug_stackoverflow.txtM. Lucinskij and P. Tumenas of SEC Consult reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1574.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1576.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Hypervisor VLAN Packet Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1576.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Hypervisor. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted virtual LAN (VLAN) packets to the target system to invoke napi_reuse_skb(), triggering a memory leak or memory corruption error and potentially causing denial of service conditions.Ryan Sweat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1576.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-1577.title: Linux Kernel EFI GUID Partition Table Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1577.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can create a device with a specially crafted EFI GUID partition table to trigger a buffer overflow and cause a kernel oops when the device is connected to the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'fs/partitions/efi.c'.Timo Warns (PRESENSE Technologies GmbH) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1577.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2011-1581.title: Linux Kernel Ethernet Bonding Driver Offset Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1581.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A network device that has more than 16 receive queues can cause the Ethernet bonding driver implementation to crash.
CVE-2011-1581.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2011-1590.title: Wireshark X.509if Dissector Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1590.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target 'X.509if' dissector to crash.
CVE-2011-1590.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-1591.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflow in DECT Dissector Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1591.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the DECT dissector and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-1591]. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. Paul Makowski from SEI/CERT reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target NFS dissector to crash [CVE-2011-1592]. Only Windows-based systems are affected.
CVE-2011-1591.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the target dissector to crash.

CVE-2011-1593.title: Linux Kernel Input Validation Flaw in next_pidmap() Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1593.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply a specially crafted value to the next_pidmap() function to trigger a kernel panic.Robert Swiecki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1593.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2011-1595.title: rdesktop Lets Remote Servers Read and Write Files on the Target User's System
CVE-2011-1595.body: A vulnerability was reported in rdesktop. A remote server can read and write files on the connected target system.The disk_create() function in 'disk.c' does not properly validate server-supplied input. A remote server can supply a specially crafted filename to read or write files on connected target system.Cendio AB and SecuriTeam reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1595.extra: A remote server can read and write files on the connected target system.

CVE-2011-1599.title: Asterisk Manager Security Check Bypass Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1599.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke the Asterisk Manager Interface and send the 'Async' header with the 'Application' header during an Originate action to bypass a security check and execute arbitrary shell commands.Mark Murawski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1599.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system.

CVE-2011-1602.title: Cisco Unified IP Phones 7900 Series Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1602.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified IP Phones (7900 Series). A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can exploit the 'su' utility to make unauthorized phone configuration modifications [CVE-2011-1602]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf07426 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2011-1603]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtn65815 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can bypass the signature verification function and load an unsigned software image [CVE-2011-1637]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtn65962 to this vulnerability.The following Cisco Unified IP Phone devices are affected: * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7975G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7971G-GE * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7970G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7965G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7962G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7961G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7961G-GE * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7945G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7942G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7941G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7941G-GE * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7931G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7911G * Cisco Unified IP Phone 7906Matt Duggan of Qualcomm reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1602.extra: A remote authenticated user can modify the configuration.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can load arbitrary software images.

CVE-2011-1603.extra: A remote authenticated user can modify the configuration.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can load arbitrary software images.

CVE-2011-1604.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service, Inject SQL Commands, and Upload Arbitrary Files
CVE-2011-1604.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands. A remote authenticated user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SIP message via TCP or UDP ports 5060 or 5061 to cause the target service to fail, interrupting voice services [CVE-2011-1604]. This vulnerability has been assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCti42904. Versions prior to 8.5(1), 8.0(3a)su2, 7.1(5b)su3, and 6.1(5)su3 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted SIP message via TCP or UDP ports 5060 or 5061 to cause the target service to fail, interrupting voice services [CVE-2011-1605]. This vulnerability has been assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCth39586. Versions prior to 8.5(1), 8.0(3), 7.1(5b)su2, and 6.1(5)su2 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted SIP message via TCP or UDP ports 5060 or 5061 to cause the target service to fail, interrupting voice services [CVE-2011-1606]. This vulnerability has been assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg62855. Versions prior to 8.5(1), 8.0(3), 7.1(5)su1, and 6.1(5)su2 are affected.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input [CVE-2011-1607]. A remote authenticated user with the ability to intercept a packet to the target device can cause an arbitrary file to be uploaded to the target system. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCti81603 to this vulnerability. Versions prior to 8.5(1), 8.0(3a)su1, 7.1(5b)su3, and 6.1(5)su3 are affected.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input [CVE-2011-1609]. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtg85647 to this vulnerability. Versions prior to 8.5(1), 8.0(3), 7.1(5)su1, and 6.1(5)su2 are affected. Alberto Revelli of Cigital reported this vulnerability. Timothy Morgan of vSecurity and Sven Taute also reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input [CVE-2011-1610]. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtj42064 to this vulnerability. Versions prior to 8.5(1)su1, 8.0(3a)su2, 7.1(5)su4, and 6.1(5)su3 are affected. Alberto Revelli of Cigital reported this vulnerability. Timothy Morgan of vSecurity and Sven Taute also reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1604.extra: A remote user can disrupt voice services.A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.

CVE-2011-1646.title: Cisco Gigabit Security Router Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1646.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco RVS4000 and WRVS4400N Gigabit Security Routers. A remote user can obtain sensitive information and authentication data from the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.If the administrator of the device has created a backup of the configuration, a remote user can obtain the configuration file [CVE-2011-1645]. The configuration includes the HTTP authentication password and VPN pre-shared keys.A remote authenticated user can exploit the ping test and traceroute test functions to inject arbitrary operating system commands with root privileges [CVE-2011-1646].A remote user can obtain the admin SSL certificate private key that is used for Quick VPN [CVE-2011-1647].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtn23871 to these vulnerabilities.The web management interface of the Cisco RVS4000 4-port Gigabit Security Routers and Cisco WRVS4400N Wireless-N Gigabit Security Routers are affected.Michal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1646.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain the configuration backup and private keys.

CVE-2011-1647.title: Cisco Gigabit Security Router Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code

A remote user can obtain sensitive information and authentication data from the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.If the administrator of the device has created a backup of the configuration, a remote user can obtain the configuration file [CVE-2011-1645]. The configuration includes the HTTP authentication password and VPN pre-shared keys.A remote authenticated user can exploit the ping test and traceroute test functions to inject arbitrary operating system commands with root privileges [CVE-2011-1646].A remote user can obtain the admin SSL certificate private key that is used for Quick VPN [CVE-2011-1647].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtn23871 to these vulnerabilities.The web management interface of the Cisco RVS4000 4-port Gigabit Security Routers and Cisco WRVS4400N Wireless-N Gigabit Security Routers are affected.Michal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1647.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain the configuration backup and private keys.

CVE-2011-1649.title: Cisco Content Delivery System Internet Streamer Web Server Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2011-1649.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Content Delivery System. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted URL to the target Internet Streamer web server to cause the target web server to crash. The service engine device hosting the web engine will remain operational.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCtg67333 and CSCth25341 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1649.extra: A remote user can cause the web service to crash.

CVE-2011-1651.title: Cisco IOS XR SPA Interface Processor IPv4 Packet Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1651.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR 12000. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted IPv4 packet to cause the target Shared Port Adapters (SPA) Interface Processor to reload.All Engine 5 Line Cards (SIP-600, SIP-601, SIP-501, and SIP-401) on the Cisco XR 12000 Series Routers are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCto45095 to this vulnerability.The following products are not affected: * Cisco 12000 Series SPA interface processors running Cisco IOS Software * Cisco XR 12000 Series Engine 3 Line Cards * Cisco ASR 9000 Series Aggregation Services Routers * Cisco Carrier Routing System Series Routers
CVE-2011-1651.extra: A remote user can cause the target SPA interface processor to reload.

CVE-2011-1653.title: CA Total Defense Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2011-1653.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in CA Total Defense. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can inject SQL commands. A remote user can obtain authentication credentials.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input [CVE-2011-1653]. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands and potentially compromise the target Unified Network Control (UNC) Server.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in file upload parameters [CVE-2011-1654]. A remote user can upload a file containing arbitrary code and then execute the code on the target Total Defense Management Server.A remote user can obtain privileged account credentials [CVE-2011-1655]. This can be exploited to take privileged actions on the target Unified Network Control (UNC) Server.
CVE-2011-1653.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can obtain login credentials.

CVE-2011-1659.title: Glibc Integer Overflow in fnmatch() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1659.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted UTF8 string data that, when processed by the target application, may cause the target application to crash. Applications that provide user-supplied data to the fnmatch() function are affected.
CVE-2011-1659.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2011-1684.title: VLC Media Player Heap Overflow in MP4_ReadBox_skcr() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1684.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MP4 file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in MP4_ReadBox_skcr() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on April 7, 2011.Aliz Hammond reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1684.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1696.title: Novell Identity Manager Roles Based Provisioning Module Input Validation Flaw in 'apwaDetailId' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1696.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Identity Manager Roles Based Provisioning Module. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Novell Identity Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The apwaDetailId parameters are affected.
CVE-2011-1696.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Novell Identity Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1699.title: Novell iPrint Buffer Overflows in Processing Printer URL Parameters Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1699.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Novell iPrint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'uri' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1699].The 'profile-time' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1700].The 'profile-name' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1701].The 'file-date-time' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1702].The 'driver-version' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1703].The 'core-package' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1704].The 'client-file-name' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1705].The 'iprint-client-config-info' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1706].The 'op-printer-list-all-jobs' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1707].The 'op-printer-list-all-jobs' parameter is affected [CVE-2011-1708].Ivan Rodriguez Almuina reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1699.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-1717.title: Skype for Android Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1717.body: A vulnerability was reported in Skype for Android. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The Skype application stores potentially sensitive information in sqlite3 databases with world readable permissions. An application on the device can access the Skype username, account balance, full name, date of birth, city/state/country, home phone, office phone, cell phone, email addresses, webpage address, bio, contact list, instant message logs, and other information.The original advisory is available at:http://www.androidpolice.com/2011/04/14/exclusive-vulnerability-in-skype-for-android-is-exposing-your-name-phone-number-chat-logs-and-a-lot-more/Justin Case reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1717.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1718.title: CA SiteMinder Header Processing Lets Remote Users Impersonate Other Users
CVE-2011-1718.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA SiteMinder. A remote user can impersonate another user.A remote user can supply specially crafted multi-line headers to impersonate another user.The vendor notes that only IIS 6.0 Web Agents are affected and that IIS 7 Web Agents are not affected.April King reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1718.extra: A remote user can impersonate another user.

CVE-2011-1719.title: CA Output Management Web Viewer ActiveX Controls Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1719.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in CA Output Management Web Viewer. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger buffer overflows in the 'UOMWV_HelperActiveX.ocx' and 'PPSView.ocx' ActiveX controls and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Dmitriy Pletnev, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1719.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1720.title: Postfix SASL Authentication Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1720.body: A vulnerability was reported in Postfix. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SASL authentication request to trigger a heap overflow and cause the target service to crash. Systems using the Cyrus SASL library with authentication mechanisms other than PLAN and LOGIN are affected.Examples of affected Cyrus SASL authentication methods include CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5, EXTERNAL, GSSAPI, KERBEROS_V4, NTLM, OTP, PASSDSS-3DES-1, and SRP.Remote code execution may be possible but was not confirmed in the report.Thomas Jarosch of Intra2net AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1720.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-1725.title: HP Network Automation Discloses Unspecified Information to Remote Users
CVE-2011-1725.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Network Automation. A remote user can obtain information.No details were provided.
CVE-2011-1725.extra: A remote user can obtain information.

CVE-2011-1726.title: HP SiteScope Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and HTML Injection Attacks
CVE-2011-1726.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP SiteScope. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject HTML.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1726]. The code will originate from the site running the HP SiteScope software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can inject HTML to obtain from or modify data on the target system [CVE-2011-1727].
CVE-2011-1726.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP SiteScope software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can inject HTML to obtain from or modify data on the target system.

CVE-2011-1737.title: Palm webOS Flaws Let Remote Users Write to the File System or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1737.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Palm webOS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target device. A remote user can write or modify files on the target device.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Email application to inject HTML and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-1737].David Belcher, BlackBerry Security Research Group, reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in applications that use the Plug-in Development Kit (PDK) to gain write access to the file system write access [CVE-2011-1738]. This may allow for information disclosure and remote code execution.
CVE-2011-1737.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code.A remote user can write or modify files on the target device.

CVE-2011-1738.title: Palm webOS Flaws Let Remote Users Write to the File System or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1738.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Palm webOS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target device. A remote user can write or modify files on the target device.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Email application to inject HTML and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2011-1737].David Belcher, BlackBerry Security Research Group, reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in applications that use the Plug-in Development Kit (PDK) to gain write access to the file system write access [CVE-2011-1738]. This may allow for information disclosure and remote code execution.
CVE-2011-1738.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code.A remote user can write or modify files on the target device.

CVE-2011-1739.title: FreeBSD mountd Lets Remote Users Bypass Access Controls in Certain Cases
CVE-2011-1739.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD mountd. A remote user can bypass access controls in certain cases.When mountd(8) parses the export host addresses (exports(5) table), an incorrect network mask may be computed in certain cases where a prefix length is not multiple of 8. A remote user may be able to access the NFS share.Ruslan Ermilov reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1739.extra: A remote user can bypass access controls in certain cases to access ostensibly restricted NFS shares.

CVE-2011-1740.title: EMC Avamar Lets Remote Authenticated Administrators Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1740.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Avamar. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated domain administrator can restore data from and/or to arbitrary clients in a different domain. This can be exploited to view information about backup, restore, and replication activities associated within a different domain.
CVE-2011-1740.extra: A remote authenticated administrator can restore data to or from arbitrary domains.

CVE-2011-1741.title: EMC Documentum eRoom Indexing Server HummingBird Client Connector Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1741.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum eRoom. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP to the HummingBird Client Connector (ftserver.exe) to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2011-1741.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1747.title: Linux Kernel AGPIOC_RESERVE and AGPIOC_ALLOCATE IOCTLs Let Local Users Consume Excessive Memory Resources
CVE-2011-1747.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The AGPIOC_RESERVE and AGPIOC_ALLOCATE ioctls do not enforce a per-process limit. A local user can exploit this to consume all available memory on the target system.Vasiliy Kulikov reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1747.extra: A local user can cause out-of-memory conditions on the target system.

CVE-2011-1752.title: Subversion mod_dav_svn Baselined WebDAV Request Processing Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1752.body: A vulnerability was reported in Subversion. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a request for baselined WebDAV resources to the target mod_dav_svn Apache HTTPD service to trigger a NULL pointer dereference.Joe Schaefer, Apache Software Foundation, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1752.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-1785.title: VMware ESXi and ESX Socket Consumption and Likewise Login Bug Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1785.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware ESXi and ESX. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to consume all available sockets on the target host [CVE-2011-1785]. Jimmy Scott at inet-solutions.be reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted username byte sequence when logging in to the Active Directory domain of the ESXi/ESX host to cause an assert error in Likewise [CVE-2011-1786]. Only version 4.1 is affected.
CVE-2011-1785.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-1786.title: VMware ESXi and ESX Socket Consumption and Likewise Login Bug Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-1786.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware ESXi and ESX. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to consume all available sockets on the target host [CVE-2011-1785]. Jimmy Scott at inet-solutions.be reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted username byte sequence when logging in to the Active Directory domain of the ESXi/ESX host to cause an assert error in Likewise [CVE-2011-1786]. Only version 4.1 is affected.
CVE-2011-1786.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2011-1788.title: VMware vCenter Discloses File to Remote Users and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1788.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware vCenter. A remote user can view files on the target system. A local user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can download files from target system [CVE-2011-0426]. Windows 2008-based installations are not affected.A local user can obtain the SOAP session ID an potentially gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1788]. VCenter versions 4.0 and 4.1 are affected. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.The vSphere Client Installer package is not digitally signed [CVE-2011-1789]. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1788.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A local user can gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-1789.title: VMware vCenter Discloses File to Remote Users and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-1789.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware vCenter. A remote user can view files on the target system. A local user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can download files from target system [CVE-2011-0426]. Windows 2008-based installations are not affected.A local user can obtain the SOAP session ID an potentially gain elevated privileges [CVE-2011-1788]. VCenter versions 4.0 and 4.1 are affected. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.The vSphere Client Installer package is not digitally signed [CVE-2011-1789]. Claudio Criscione reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1789.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A local user can gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-1820.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Privileged Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-1820.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Tivoli Directory Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system (APAR IO14045 and IO14046)A local user with privileges to view the audit log or server trace can obtain potentially sensitive information (APAR IO14043 and IO14044).
CVE-2011-1820.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1825.title: CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2011-1825.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-1825]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the CA Arcot WebFort software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to a different site [CVE-2011-1826].The Administrative Console is affected. End-user pages are not affected.Daniel Stirnimann, Compass Security AG, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1825.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the CA Arcot WebFort software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to a different site.

CVE-2011-1826.title: CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2011-1826.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-1825]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the CA Arcot WebFort software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to a different site [CVE-2011-1826].The Administrative Console is affected. End-user pages are not affected.Daniel Stirnimann, Compass Security AG, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-1826.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the CA Arcot WebFort software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to a different site.

CVE-2011-1838.title: TWiki Input Validation Flaw in the 'origurl' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1838.body: A vulnerability was reported in TWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The view and login scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'origurl' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.mavitunasecurity.com/xss-vulnerability-in-twiki/Mesut Timur reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-1838.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1848.title: HP Intelligent Management Center Buffer Overflows and File Overwrite Bug Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-1848.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in HP Intelligent Management Center. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow or memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The 'img.exe' component, listening on TCP port 8800, is affected [CVE-2011-1848].The 'dbman.exe' component, listening on UDP port 2810, is affected [CVE-2011-1850].The 'tftpserver.exe' component is affected [CVE-2011-1851, CVE-2011-1852, CVE-2011-1853].The 'imcsyslogdm.exe' component, listening on UDP port 514, is affected [CVE-2011-1854].A remote user can send specially crafted data to the 'tftpserver.exe' component to create arbitrary files, leading to arbitrary code execution [CVE-2011-1849].Luigi Auriemma and AbdulAziz Hariri reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-1848.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-1856.title: HP Business Availability Center Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-1856.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Business Availability Center. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Business Availability Center software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2011-1856.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Business Availability Center software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-1862.title: HP Service Manager Multiple Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Access and Inject Scripting Code, Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, Hijack Sessions, and Obtain Information
CVE-2011-1862.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Service Manager and HP Service Center. A remote authenticated user can gain unauthorized access. A local user can gain access to the system. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can gain read access to the system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can inject scripting code.A remote authenticated user can gain unauthorized access to the target system [CVE-2011-1857].A local user can gain access to the system [CVE-2011-1858].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2011-1859].A remote user can conduct HTTP session credential re-use attacks to gain access to user sessions [CVE-2011-1860].A remote user can gain read access to the target system [CVE-2011-1861].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-1862]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Service Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can inject scripting code [CVE-2011-1863].The following versions are affected:HP Service Manager v9.21, v9.20, v7.11, v7.02 running on AIX, HP-UX, Linux, Solaris, and WindowsHP Service Manager client v9.21, v9.20, v7.11, v7.02 running on WindowsHP Service Center v6.2.8 Client running on WindowsHP Service Center v6.2.8 running on AIX, HP-UX, Linux, Solaris, and Windows
CVE-2011-1862.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain unauthorized access to the target system.A local user can gain access to the system.A remote user can hijack user sessions.A remote user can gain read access to the system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Service Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can inject scripting code.
