CVE-2011-2357.title: Google Android Browser URL Loading Flaw Permits Cross-Application Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-2357.body: A vulnerability was reported in Google Android. A remote user can conduct cross-application scripting attacks.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the browser's URL loading process. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the target domain and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Roee Hay and Yair Amit of the IBM Rational Application Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2357.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the target site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2391.title: Apple iOS Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, Obtain Information, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Applications Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-2391.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. An application can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can bypass the screen lock.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted IPv6 ICMP packets to cause excessive CPU resource consumption on the target system [CVE-2011-2391]. Marc Heuse reported this vulnerability.An application can bypass passcode-attempt limits to attempt to determine the target user's passcode [CVE-2013-0957]. Jin Han of the Institute for Infocomm Research working with Qiang Yan and Su Mon Kywe of Singapore Management University reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in the processing of XML files and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2013-1036]. Kai Lu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code [CVE-2013-1037, CVE-2013-1038, CVE-2013-1039, CVE-2013-1040, CVE-2013-1041, CVE-2013-1042, CVE-2013-1043, CVE-2013-1044, CVE-2013-1045, CVE-2013-1046, CVE-2013-1047]. Google Chrome Security Team, own-hero Research (via iDefense VCP), Apple, and miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A remote user that can cause arbitrary code execution may be able to cause the code to persist across reboots due to buffer overflows in the dyld openSharedCacheFile() function [CVE-2013-3950]. Stefan Esser reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in the mach_port_space_info API to gain kernel level privileges [CVE-2013-3953]. Stefan Esser reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in the posix_spawn API to gain kernel level privileges [CVE-2013-3954]. Stefan Esser reported this vulnerability.A user that can mount a non-HFS filesystem can exploit a flaw in the processing of AppleDouble files to execute arbitrary with kernel privileges [CVE-2013-3955]. Stefan Esser reported this vulnerability.A remote user may be able to exploit a flaw in the generation of Personal Hotspot passwords to predict the password and join the target user's Personal Hotspot [CVE-2013-4616]. Andreas Kurtz of NESO Security Labs and Daniel Metz of University Erlangen-Nuremberg reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in WebKit and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2013-5125, CVE-2013-5126, CVE-2013-5127, CVE-2013-5128] Google Chrome Security Team and Apple reported this vulnerability.Dragging or pasting a selection may allow cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2013-5129]. Mario Heiderich reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code in the context of another site [CVE-2013-5131]. Erling A Ellingsen reported this vulnerability.A remote user that can intercept network traffic may be able to use a TrustWave sub-CA certificate to access user credentials or other sensitive information [CVE-2013-5134].A background application can inject user interface events into the foreground application [CVE-2013-5137]. Mackenzie Straight at Mobile Labs reported this vulnerability.An application can trigger a null pointer dereference in IOCatalogue and cause the system to crash [CVE-2013-5138]. Will Estes reported this vulnerability.An application can trigger an array access flaw in the IOSerialFamily driver and execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2013-5139]. @dent1zt reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet fragment to cause the target device to restart [CVE-2013-5140]. Joonas Kuorilehto of Codenomicon, an anonymousresearcher (via CERT-FI), Antti LevomAki and Lauri Virtanen of Vulnerability Analysis Group, and Stonesoft reported this vulnerability.An application can trigger an integer truncation flaw to cause the CPU to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2013-5141]. CESG reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in the msgctl and segctl APIs to access the contents of kernel stack memory [CVE-2013-5142]. Kenzley Alphonse of Kenx Technology, Inc reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in kextd in the handling of IPC messages from unauthenticated senders [CVE-2013-5145]. "Rainbow PRISM" reported this vulnerability.An application may be able to access a push notification token when the user has not provided permission [CVE-2013-5149]. Jack Flintermann of Grouper, Inc. reported this vulnerability.A physically local user can view the history of pages recently visited in an open tab after clearing the Safari history [CVE-2013-5150].A remote user can create a specially crafted web site file rendered with the 'Content-Type: text/plain' header that, when viewed by the target user, will allow cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2013-5151]. Ben Toews of Github reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will display an arbitrary URL [CVE-2013-5152]. Keita Haga of keitahaga.com and Lukasz Pilorz of RBS reported this vulnerability.A physically local user with a device in Lost Mode may be able to view notifications [CVE-2013-5153]. Daniel Stangroom reported this vulnerability.Script applications are not properly sandboxed. An application may be able to run without a sandbox [CVE-2013-5154]. evad3rs reported this vulnerability.An application can write specific values to the /dev/random device to cause the CPU to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2013-5155]. CESG reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in the telephony subsystem to to bypass supported APIs and control or interfere with the telephony daemon [CVE-2013-5156]. Jin Han of the Institute for Infocomm Research working with Qiang Yan and Su Mon Kywe of Singapore Management University reported this vulnerability. Tielei Wang, Kangjie Lu, Long Lu, Simon Chung, and Wenke Lee from the Georgia Institute of Technology also reported this vulnerability.An application can exploit a flaw in the Twitter subsystem to bypass supported APIs and control or interfere with the Twitter system daemon [CVE-2013-5157]. Jin Han of the Institute for Infocomm Research working with Qiang Yan and Su Mon Kywe of Singapore Management University reported this vulnerability. Tielei Wang, Kangjie Lu, Long Lu, Simon Chung, and Wenke Lee from the Georgia Institute of Technology also reported this vulnerability.On systems with no passcode, a user can exploit a flaw in the Twitter icon cache determine the Twitter accounts that the target user had recently interacted with [CVE-2013-5158]. Jonathan Zdziarski reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the the window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame() API and obtain information from the target user's system [CVE-2013-5159].
CVE-2011-2391.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.An application can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can bypass the screen lock.

CVE-2011-2400.title: HP SiteScope Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Session Fixation Attacks
CVE-2011-2400.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP SiteScope. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-2400]. The code will originate from the site running the HP SiteScope software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack the target user's session [CVE-2011-2401].
CVE-2011-2400.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP SiteScope software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack a target user's session.

CVE-2011-2402.title: HP Network Automation Permits Cross-Site Scripting and SQL Injection Attacks
CVE-2011-2402.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Network Automation. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-2402]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Network Automation software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-2403].
CVE-2011-2402.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Network Automation software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-2403.title: HP Network Automation Permits Cross-Site Scripting and SQL Injection Attacks
CVE-2011-2403.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Network Automation. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2011-2402]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Network Automation software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-2403].
CVE-2011-2403.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Network Automation software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-2446.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2446.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.instruder of Code Audit Labs of vulnhunt.com, Pablo Santamaria of Core Security Technologies, and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2446.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2447.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2447.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.instruder of Code Audit Labs of vulnhunt.com, Pablo Santamaria of Core Security Technologies, and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2447.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2448.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2448.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.instruder of Code Audit Labs of vulnhunt.com, Pablo Santamaria of Core Security Technologies, and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2448.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2449.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2449.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.instruder of Code Audit Labs of vulnhunt.com, Pablo Santamaria of Core Security Technologies, and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2449.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2463.title: Adobe ColdFusion Input Validation Flaws in cfform and RDS Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-2463.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The cfform tag field is affected [CVE-2011-2463]. Shawn Gorrell and Howard Fore of the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta reported this vulnerability.RDS is affected [CVE-2011-4368]. Oren Hafif of Hacktics ASC, Ernst & Young reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2463.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2486.title: nspluginwrapper NPNVprivateModeBool Variable Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2486.body: A vulnerability was reported in nspluginwrapper. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.nspluginwrapper does not forward the NPNVprivateModeBool variable. Certain applications using the wrapper may crash and require a restart.
CVE-2011-2486.extra: A remote user may be able to cause the target user's application to crash.

CVE-2011-2492.title: Linux Kernel Bluetooth 'l2cap_conninfo' and 'rfcomm_conninfo' Initialization Flaw Lets Local Users Obtain Kernel Memory Contents
CVE-2011-2492.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain information from kernel memory.The Bluetooth 'cinfo' structures 'l2cap_conninfo' and 'rfcomm_conninfo' copy one byte of uninitialized memory from the kernel stack to user-space. A local user can obtain information from kernel memory.Marek Kroemeke and Filip Palian reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2492.extra: A local user can obtain information from kernel memory on the target system.

CVE-2011-2511.title: libvirt RPC Processing Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2511.body: A vulnerability was reported in libvirt. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted RPC data to trigger an integer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2011-2511.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2513.title: IcedTea-Web Bugs Let Remote Users Determine the Home Directory Path and Manipulate the Security Warning Dialog
CVE-2011-2513.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IcedTea-Web. A remote user can determine the home directory path. A remote user can manipulate the Java Web Start security warning dialog.A remote unsigned Java Web Start application or Java applet can exploit a flaw in the Java Network Launching Protocol (JNLP) implementation to determine the path to the cache directory used to store downloaded Java class and archive files, which may disclose the user's login name [CVE-2011-2513].A remote unsigned Java Web Start application can exploit a flaw in the JNLP implementation to manipulate the content of a Security Warning dialog box [CVE-2011-2514]. The remote user may be able to cause the target user to unintentionally grant the application access permissions to local files.Omair Majid reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2513.extra: A remote user can determine the home directory path.A remote user can manipulate the Java Web Start security warning dialog.

CVE-2011-2514.title: IcedTea-Web Bugs Let Remote Users Determine the Home Directory Path and Manipulate the Security Warning Dialog
CVE-2011-2514.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IcedTea-Web. A remote user can determine the home directory path. A remote user can manipulate the Java Web Start security warning dialog.A remote unsigned Java Web Start application or Java applet can exploit a flaw in the Java Network Launching Protocol (JNLP) implementation to determine the path to the cache directory used to store downloaded Java class and archive files, which may disclose the user's login name [CVE-2011-2513].A remote unsigned Java Web Start application can exploit a flaw in the JNLP implementation to manipulate the content of a Security Warning dialog box [CVE-2011-2514]. The remote user may be able to cause the target user to unintentionally grant the application access permissions to local files.Omair Majid reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2514.extra: A remote user can determine the home directory path.A remote user can manipulate the Java Web Start security warning dialog.

CVE-2011-2516.title: Apache Santuario Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2516.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Santuario. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted key that, when used by the target user or application to sign or verify XML signatures, will trigger a buffer overflow and crash.Paulo Zanoni reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2516.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2011-2520.title: Red Hat system-config-firewall Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2011-2520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat system-config-firewall. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.The system-config-firewall utility uses the Python pickle module in an insecure way when sending data (via D-Bus) to the privileged back-end mechanism. A local user with privileges to configure firewall rules can exploit this to send a specially-crafted serialized object to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.Marco Slaviero of SensePost reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2520.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2011-2522.title: Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Request Forgery and Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-2522.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Samba in the Samba Web Administration Tool. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'user' field of the 'Change Password' function in the Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-2694]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Samba SWAT software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Samba SWAT does not properly validate requests. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks [CVE-2011-2522].
CVE-2011-2522.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Samba SWAT software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2524.title: libsoup SoupServer Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Files
CVE-2011-2524.body: A vulnerability was reported in libsoup SoupServer. A remote user can view files on the target system.The SoupServer does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system that are located outside of the document directory.
CVE-2011-2524.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2011-2526.title: Apache Tomcat Lets Malicious Applications Obtain Information and Deny Service
CVE-2011-2526.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. An application can obtain restricted files and cause denial of service conditions.An untrusted web application can supply specially crafted attributes to sendfile to obtain ostensibly restricted files or cause the JVM to crash.Systems where the SecurityManager is used to limit the untrusted web applications, where the HTTP NIO or HTTP APR connector is used, and where sendfile is enabled for the connector (the default configuration) are affected.The Tomcat security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2526.extra: An application can cause the JVM to crash.An application can access restricted files on the target system.

CVE-2011-2529.title: Asterisk SIP Channel Driver Null Character Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2529.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SIP packet containing a null to cause Asterisk to modify unrelated memory structures and crash.TCP/TLS connections are not affected.Paul Belanger reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2529.extra: A remote user can cause Asterisk to crash.

CVE-2011-2535.title: Asterisk IAX2 Channel Driver Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2535.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2011-2535.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2011-2536.title: Asterisk Discloses Username Validity to Remote Users
CVE-2011-2536.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can determine valid SIP usernames.The system may respond differently to remote SIP requests from an invalid SIP user than it responds to a valid SIP user (as configured on the target system). This may occur even when the alwaysauthreject option is set in the configuration.A remote user can exploit this to determine valid SIP usernames.
CVE-2011-2536.extra: A remote user can determine valid SIP usernames.

CVE-2011-2543.title: Cisco TelePresence Bugs Permits Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2011-2543.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Endpoint web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-2544]. A remote user can create a specially crafted Call ID value that, when viewed by a target authenticated user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco TelePresence interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtq46488 to this vulnerability.The getXML handle does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can load a specially crafted URL to cause the target Endpoint to reboot [CVE-2011-2543].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtq46496 to this vulnerability.David Klein of Sense of Security Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2543.extra: A remote user can cause the target endpoint to reboot.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco TelePresence interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2544.title: Cisco TelePresence Bugs Permits Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2011-2544.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Endpoint web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-2544]. A remote user can create a specially crafted Call ID value that, when viewed by a target authenticated user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco TelePresence interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtq46488 to this vulnerability.The getXML handle does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can load a specially crafted URL to cause the target Endpoint to reboot [CVE-2011-2543].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtq46496 to this vulnerability.David Klein of Sense of Security Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2544.extra: A remote user can cause the target endpoint to reboot.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco TelePresence interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2546.title: Cisco SA500 Series Security Appliance Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands and Remote Authenticated Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2011-2546.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco SA500 Series Security Appliance. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The login form of the web management interface does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-2546]. This can be exploited to obtain usernames and passwords for accounts on the device.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtq65669 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user on the web management interface can send specially crafted parameters via several web forms to execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2011-2547]. The commands will run with root privileges.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtq65681 to this vulnerability.The following models are affected by these vulnerabilities:Cisco SA520Cisco SA520WCisco SA540Michal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2546.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain root privileges on the target system.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-2547.title: Cisco SA500 Series Security Appliance Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands and Remote Authenticated Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2011-2547.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco SA500 Series Security Appliance. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The login form of the web management interface does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2011-2546]. This can be exploited to obtain usernames and passwords for accounts on the device.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtq65669 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user on the web management interface can send specially crafted parameters via several web forms to execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2011-2547]. The commands will run with root privileges.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtq65681 to this vulnerability.The following models are affected by these vulnerabilities:Cisco SA520Cisco SA520WCisco SA540Michal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2547.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain root privileges on the target system.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2011-2578.title: Cisco IOS Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Security Controls, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Deny Service
CVE-2011-2578.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security controls. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets on a NAT interface to consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2011-2578]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12366 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.1 and 15.2 are affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted HTTP response to trigger a flaw in the HTTP client and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-2586]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12249 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.A physically local user can bypass the No Service Password-Recovery feature and read the start-up configuration [CVE-2011-3289]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr97640 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the NETIO and IPV4_IO processes and cause excessive CPU consumption on the target device [CVE-2011-3295]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCti59888 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS XR 3.8 through 4.1 is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted traffic to trigger a flaw in the "set mpls experimental imposition" command and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4007]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr56576 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.0 and 15.1 and IOS XE 3.x are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an ICMPv6 ACL bug with unspecified impact [CVE-2011-4012]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID Bug ID CSCtj90091 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.0, 15.0, and 15.1 are affected. Systems using a Policy Feature Card 3C (PFC3C) are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted UDP traffic to UDP port 465 to cause an interface queue wedge [CVE-2011-4015]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts48300 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.2S is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the PPP implementation and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4016]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf71673 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected. Systems using Point-to-Point Termination and Aggregation (PTA) and L2TP are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0338]. A remote user can establish a SSH connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv86113 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0339]. A remote user can establish a Telnet connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi77774 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The ACL function does not properly process lines that end with a log or time keyword [CVE-2012-0362]. A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to bypass access control list (ACL) restrictions in certain cases. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts01106 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2(58)SE2 and 15.0(1)SE are affected.
CVE-2011-2578.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can connect via Telnet and SSH from arbitrary IP addresses.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.

CVE-2011-2581.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 3000 and 5000 Switches Let Remote Users Bypass Access Control Lists
CVE-2011-2581.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS. A remote user can bypass access control lists.A remote user can bypass deny statements in access control lists (ACLs).Systems with a remark statement configured before a deny statement on an ACL are affected.IPv4, IPv6 and MAC ACLs are affected.Quality of service (QoS) classification and route-map ACLs are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCto09813 and CSCtr61490 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2581.extra: A remote user can bypass access control lists to access ostensibly protected resources.

CVE-2011-2583.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2583.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Contact Center Express. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to cause unspecified denial of service conditions.Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCth33834 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2583.extra: A remote user can cause unspecified denial of service conditions.

A remote user can establish a SSH connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv86113 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0339]. A remote user can establish a Telnet connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi77774 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The ACL function does not properly process lines that end with a log or time keyword [CVE-2012-0362]. A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to bypass access control list (ACL) restrictions in certain cases. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts01106 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2(58)SE2 and 15.0(1)SE are affected.
CVE-2011-2586.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can connect via Telnet and SSH from arbitrary IP addresses.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.

CVE-2011-2597.title: Wireshark Lucent/Ascend File Parser Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2597.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the Lucent/Ascend file parser to enter an infinite loop.
CVE-2011-2597.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2011-2608.title: HP OpenView Performance Agent 'ovbbccb.exe' Lets Remote Users Delete Arbitrary Files
CVE-2011-2608.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Performance Agent. A remote user can delete files on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted data to TCP port 383 to cause the system to delete an arbitrary file on the target system or a related managed system with System level privileges.'ovbbccb.exe' versions 6.20.50.0 and prior are affected.The original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/ovbbccb_1-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2608.extra: A remote user can delete arbitrary files on the target system or a related managed system.

CVE-2011-2654.title: Novell Cloud Manager RPC Processing Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2654.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Cloud Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an RPC processing flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on April 4, 2011.1c239c43f521145fa8385d64a9c32243 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-2654.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2667.title: CA Gateway Security URL Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2667.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Gateway Security. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via HTTP on TCP port 8080 to trigger a heap corruption flaw in 'Icihttp.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on January 21, 2011.Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-2667.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2667.title: CA Total Defense URL Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2667.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Total Defense. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via HTTP on TCP port 8080 to trigger a heap corruption flaw in 'Icihttp.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on January 21, 2011.Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-2667.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2694.title: Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Request Forgery and Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-2694.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Samba in the Samba Web Administration Tool. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'user' field of the 'Change Password' function in the Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2011-2694]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Samba SWAT software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Samba SWAT does not properly validate requests. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks [CVE-2011-2522].
CVE-2011-2694.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Samba SWAT software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2701.title: FreeRADIUS Lets Remote Users Bypass OCSP Certificate Validation Using Expired Certificates
CVE-2011-2701.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeRADIUS. A remote user can authenticate with a revoked certificate.A remote user can supply a revoked certificate from a trusted certificate authority (CA) to authenticate against the target FreeRADIUS server (provided the user has the corresponding private key associated with the certificate). Systems configued to use EAP-TLS with OCSP certificate validation are affected.The vulnerability resides in the ocsp_check() function in 'rlm_eap_tls.c', where the status of the certificate is not checked.DFN-CERT Services GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2701.extra: A remote user can authenticate with a revoked certificate.

CVE-2011-2712.title: Apache Wicket Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-2712.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Wicket. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Apache Wicket software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Systems with multi window support enabled are affected.Sven Krewitt of TUV Rheinland i-sec GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2712.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Apache Wicket software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-2713.title: OpenOffice.org Word Document File Importer Out-of-Bounds Read Error May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2713.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Word document that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an out-of-bounds read and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Red Hat, Inc. security researcher Huzaifa Sidhpurwala reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2713.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, may execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2721.title: Clam AntiVirus Hash Processing Off-by-One Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2721.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a file containing a specially crafted hash signature that, when processed by Clam AntiVirus, will trigger an off-by-one error and cause the 'clamscan' antivirus service to crash.
CVE-2011-2721.extra: A remote user can cause the clamscan process to crash.

CVE-2011-2723.title: Linux Kernel skb_gro_header_slow() Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2723.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target system to crash.Systems that have enabled Generic Receive Offload (GRO) are affected.
CVE-2011-2723.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2011-2724.title: Samba 'mount.cifs' check_newline() Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2724.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba cifs-utils. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The 'mount.cifs' check_newline() function does not properly process share or directory names that contain a newline character. A local user can send a specially crafted Common Internet File System (CIFS) share mount request to corrupt the mounted file systems table (mtab) file.The vulnerability was due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2010-0547.
CVE-2011-2724.extra: A local user can cause the Samba service to crash.

CVE-2011-2729.title: Apache Tomcat Commons Daemon jsvc Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2011-2729.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system in certain cases.The Common Daemon jsvc service wrapper does not drop capabilities. The application can access files and directories that are owned by the superuser.Only Linux-based systems are affected.Systems where jsvc was compiled with libcap and where the '-user' parameter is invoked are affected.Wilfried Weissmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2729.extra: A local user can access files and directories that are owned by the superuser.

CVE-2011-2735.title: EMC AutoStart Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2735.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC AutoStart. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2011-2735.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2736.title: RSA enVision Lets Remote Users View Files and Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2011-2736.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA enVision. A remote user can view files on the target system. A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative passwords.A remote authenticated user can view administrative credentials in Task Escalation emails [CVE-2011-2736]. Only version 4.x is affected.A remote user can view arbitrary files on target system [CVE-2011-2737].
CVE-2011-2736.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative passwords.

CVE-2011-2737.title: RSA enVision Lets Remote Users View Files and Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2011-2737.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA enVision. A remote user can view files on the target system. A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative passwords.A remote authenticated user can view administrative credentials in Task Escalation emails [CVE-2011-2736]. Only version 4.x is affected.A remote user can view arbitrary files on target system [CVE-2011-2737].
CVE-2011-2737.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative passwords.

CVE-2011-2740.title: RSA Key Manager Appliance Session Logout Bug Fails to Terminate Sessions
CVE-2011-2740.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Key Manager Appliance. A remote authenticated user session may not terminate properly.When using Firefox 4 and 5, an authenticated user session is not terminated properly when logging out.
CVE-2011-2740.extra: A remote authenticated user session may not terminate properly.

CVE-2011-2741.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Certain Security Controls
CVE-2011-2741.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise). A remote user may be able to bypass certain security controls.A remote user can send specially crafted data elements to affect the Device Recovery capability and Device Identification used by the defined policy [CVE-2011-2741]. A remote user can exploit this to recover a previously non-registered device or allow access for a registered device. Both web and mobile browsers are affected.A remote user on a mobile device can bypass define policy to gain access to a restricted application [CVE-2011-2742]. Only apps are affected. Web browsers are not affected.
CVE-2011-2741.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass certain security controls.

CVE-2011-2742.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Certain Security Controls
CVE-2011-2742.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise). A remote user may be able to bypass certain security controls.A remote user can send specially crafted data elements to affect the Device Recovery capability and Device Identification used by the defined policy [CVE-2011-2741]. A remote user can exploit this to recover a previously non-registered device or allow access for a registered device. Both web and mobile browsers are affected.A remote user on a mobile device can bypass define policy to gain access to a restricted application [CVE-2011-2742]. Only apps are affected. Web browsers are not affected.
CVE-2011-2742.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass certain security controls.

CVE-2011-2748.title: ISC DHCP Packet Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2748.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to halt.David Zych at University of Illinois reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2748.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to halt.

CVE-2011-2749.title: ISC DHCP Packet Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2011-2749.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to halt.David Zych at University of Illinois reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2011-2749.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to halt.

CVE-2011-2750.title: Novell File Reporter Lets Remote Users Delete Arbitrary Files
CVE-2011-2750.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell File Reporter. A remote user can delete files on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to 'NFRAgent.exe' via HTTPS on TCP port 3037 to delete arbitrary files on the target system and connected shares.The original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/nfr_2-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2750.extra: A remote user can delete files on the target system.

CVE-2011-2825.title: Apple iOS Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-2825.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A local user can bypass the screen lock.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause CFNetwork to send unexpected request headers and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0641].A user can create a specially crafted HFS disk image that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer underflow and cause the system to shutdown or execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-0642].A user can run a specially crafted program to exploit a bug in the handling of debug system calls and bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2012-0643].A physically local user can bypass the screen lock passcode function [CVE-2012-0644].A remote user can cause web page visits to be recorded in the browser history when Private Browsing is active by exploiting the JavaScript methods pushState and replaceState [CVE-2012-0585].A physically local user can use Siri to access a front-most email message selected behind a lock screen [CVE-2012-0645].A remote user can create a specially crafted Racoon configuration file to trigger a format string flaw and execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2012-0646].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-0586, CVE-2012-0587, CVE-2012-0588, CVE-2012-0589, CVE-2012-0590]. The code will run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-2825, CVE-2011-2833, CVE-2011-2846, CVE-2011-2847, CVE-2011-2854, CVE-2011-2855, CVE-2011-2857, CVE-2011-2860, CVE-2011-2867, CVE-2011-2868, CVE-2011-2869, CVE-2011-2870, CVE-2011-2871, CVE-2011-2872, CVE-2011-2873, CVE-2011-3908, CVE-2011-3909, CVE-2012-0591, CVE-2012-0592, CVE-2012-0593, CVE-2012-0594, CVE-2012-0595, CVE-2012-0596, CVE-2012-0597, CVE-2012-0598, CVE-2012-0599, CVE-2012-0600, CVE-2012-0601, CVE-2012-0602, CVE-2012-0603, CVE-2012-0604, CVE-2012-0605, CVE-2012-0606, CVE-2012-0607, CVE-2012-0608, CVE-2012-0609, CVE-2012-0610, CVE-2012-0611, CVE-2012-0612, CVE-2012-0613, CVE-2012-0614, CVE-2012-0615, CVE-2012-0616, CVE-2012-0617, CVE-2012-0618, CVE-2012-0619, CVE-2012-0620, CVE-2012-0621, CVE-2012-0622, CVE-2012-0623, CVE-2012-0624, CVE-2012-0625, CVE-2012-0626, CVE-2012-0627, CVE-2012-0628, CVE-2012-0629, CVE-2012-0630, CVE-2012-0631, CVE-2012-0632, CVE-2012-0633, CVE-2012-0635]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The following researchers reported these vulnerabilities:AppleSergey GlazunovJochen Eisinger of Google Chrome TeamAlan Austin of polyvore.comAdam Barth of Google Chrome Security TeamEric Melville of American ExpressRoland Kohler of the German Federal Ministry of Economics and Technologypod2g2012 iOS Jailbreak Dream TeamErling Ellingsen of FacebookGoogle Chrome Security Team (scarybeasts)wushi of team509 (via iDefense VCP and TippingPoint ZDI)ChuArthur GerkisDirk SchulzeAlexander Gavrun (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative)Lei Zhang of the Chromium development communityAdam Klein of the Chromium development communityDmytro Gorbunov of SaveSources.comMarshall GreenblattDharani Govindan of Google ChromeAki Helin of OUSPGDave Levin of the Google Chrome Security TeamMartin Barbella using AddressSanitizerSlawomir BlazekmiaubizSergio Villar Senin of IgaliaAbhishek Arya (Inferno) of Google Chrome Security TeamCris Neckar of the Google Chrome Security Team using AddressSanitizerJulien Chaffraix of the Chromium development communityMartin Barbella using AddressSanitizer
CVE-2011-2825.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can bypass the screen lock.

CVE-2011-2847.title: Apple iOS Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-2847.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A local user can bypass the screen lock.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause CFNetwork to send unexpected request headers and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0641].A user can create a specially crafted HFS disk image that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer underflow and cause the system to shutdown or execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-0642].A user can run a specially crafted program to exploit a bug in the handling of debug system calls and bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2012-0643].A physically local user can bypass the screen lock passcode function [CVE-2012-0644].A remote user can cause web page visits to be recorded in the browser history when Private Browsing is active by exploiting the JavaScript methods pushState and replaceState [CVE-2012-0585].A physically local user can use Siri to access a front-most email message selected behind a lock screen [CVE-2012-0645].A remote user can create a specially crafted Racoon configuration file to trigger a format string flaw and execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2012-0646].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-0586, CVE-2012-0587, CVE-2012-0588, CVE-2012-0589, CVE-2012-0590]. The code will run in the security context of an arbitrary site. A local user can bypass the screen lock.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause CFNetwork to send unexpected request headers and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0641].A user can create a specially crafted HFS disk image that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer underflow and cause the system to shutdown or execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-0642].A user can run a specially crafted program to exploit a bug in the handling of debug system calls and bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2012-0643].A physically local user can bypass the screen lock passcode function [CVE-2012-0644].A remote user can cause web page visits to be recorded in the browser history when Private Browsing is active by exploiting the JavaScript methods pushState and replaceState [CVE-2012-0585].A physically local user can use Siri to access a front-most email message selected behind a lock screen [CVE-2012-0645].A remote user can create a specially crafted Racoon configuration file to trigger a format string flaw and execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2012-0646].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-0586, CVE-2012-0587, CVE-2012-0588, CVE-2012-0589, CVE-2012-0590]. The code will run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-2825, CVE-2011-2833, CVE-2011-2846, CVE-2011-2847, CVE-2011-2854, CVE-2011-2855, CVE-2011-2857, CVE-2011-2860, CVE-2011-2867, CVE-2011-2868, CVE-2011-2869, CVE-2011-2870, CVE-2011-2871, CVE-2011-2872, CVE-2011-2873, CVE-2011-3908, CVE-2011-3909, CVE-2012-0591, CVE-2012-0592, CVE-2012-0593, CVE-2012-0594, CVE-2012-0595, CVE-2012-0596, CVE-2012-0597, CVE-2012-0598, CVE-2012-0599, CVE-2012-0600, CVE-2012-0601, CVE-2012-0602, CVE-2012-0603, CVE-2012-0604, CVE-2012-0605, CVE-2012-0606, CVE-2012-0607, CVE-2012-0608, CVE-2012-0609, CVE-2012-0610, CVE-2012-0611, CVE-2012-0612, CVE-2012-0613, CVE-2012-0614, CVE-2012-0615, CVE-2012-0616, CVE-2012-0617, CVE-2012-0618, CVE-2012-0619, CVE-2012-0620, CVE-2012-0621, CVE-2012-0622, CVE-2012-0623, CVE-2012-0624, CVE-2012-0625, CVE-2012-0626, CVE-2012-0627, CVE-2012-0628, CVE-2012-0629, CVE-2012-0630, CVE-2012-0631, CVE-2012-0632, CVE-2012-0633, CVE-2012-0635]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The following researchers reported these vulnerabilities:AppleSergey GlazunovJochen Eisinger of Google Chrome TeamAlan Austin of polyvore.comAdam Barth of Google Chrome Security TeamEric Melville of American ExpressRoland Kohler of the German Federal Ministry of Economics and Technologypod2g2012 iOS Jailbreak Dream TeamErling Ellingsen of FacebookGoogle Chrome Security Team (scarybeasts)wushi of team509 (via iDefense VCP and TippingPoint ZDI)ChuArthur GerkisDirk SchulzeAlexander Gavrun (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative)Lei Zhang of the Chromium development communityAdam Klein of the Chromium development communityDmytro Gorbunov of SaveSources.comMarshall GreenblattDharani Govindan of Google ChromeAki Helin of OUSPGDave Levin of the Google Chrome Security TeamMartin Barbella using AddressSanitizerSlawomir BlazekmiaubizSergio Villar Senin of IgaliaAbhishek Arya (Inferno) of Google Chrome Security TeamCris Neckar of the Google Chrome Security Team using AddressSanitizerJulien Chaffraix of the Chromium development communityMartin Barbella using AddressSanitizer
CVE-2011-2873.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can bypass the screen lock.

CVE-2011-2895.title: libXfont Heap Overflow in LZW Decompresser Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2895.body: A vulnerability was reported in libXfont. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted LZW stream that, when processed by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow in the LZW decompresser and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.
CVE-2011-2895.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2896.title: GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP) Buffer Overflow in Processing GIF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2896.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted GIF image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in LZWReadByte() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'plug-ins/common/file-gif-load.c'.
CVE-2011-2896.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-2899.title: system-config-printer 'pysmb.py' NetBIOS Parameter Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2011-2899.body: A vulnerability was reported in system-config-printer. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote SMB server on the local network can send a specially crafted NetBIOS and workgroup name to cause the target system to execute arbitrary commands when 'pysmb.py' is run on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the user running system-config-printer.
CVE-2011-2899.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2011-2925.title: Red Hat Enterprise MRG Grid 'cumin' Bug Lets Local Users Access Broker Password
CVE-2011-2925.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise MRG Grid. A local user can access the broker password.Cumin writes broker authentication credentials to the Cumin log file. A local user can access the file to obtain the broker username and password.This can be exploited to connect to the broker to schedule jobs, set attributes on jobs, hold, release, or remove jobs, manipulate message queues, and perform other privileged operations.
CVE-2011-2925.extra: A local user can access the broker username and password.

CVE-2011-2940.title: Stunnel Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2940.body: A vulnerability was reported in Stunnel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2011-2940.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2945.title: RealPlayer Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2945.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted SIPR data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2011-2945]. Only Windows is affected.A flaw in an ActiveX control can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-2946]. Only Windows is affected.A remote user can cause scripting code to execute in a different zone [CVE-2011-2947].A specially crafted SWF file can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-2948].A specially crafted MP3 ID3 tag value can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-2949].Specially crafted QCP data can trigger code execution [CVE-2011-2950]. Only Windows is affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the advanced audio coding element to cause code execution [CVE-2011-2951].A remote user can trigger a use-after-free bug in a dialog box [CVE-2011-2952]. Only Windows is affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in an ActiveX control browser plug-in [CVE-2011-2953]. Only Windows is affected.A use-after-free can be triggered in the embedded AutoUpdate feature [CVE-2011-2954]. Only Windows is affected.A remote user can trigger a use-after-free in an embedded modal dialog [CVE-2011-2955].Krystian Kloskowski (h07) via Secunia Research, Donato Ferrante and Andrzej Dyjak (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Omair (via iDefense Labs), getB33r (via iDefense Labs), Martin Bartek (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Sean de Regge (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Donato Ferrante and Andrzej Dyjak (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative),

CVE-2011-2960.title: Sunway ForceControl Heap Overflow in WebServer Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2960.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sunway ForceControl. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to trigger a heap overflow in 'httpsvr.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Dillon Beresford of NSS Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2960.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2961.title: Sunway pNetPower AngelServer Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-2961.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sunway pNetPower. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted UDP packets to the target 'AngelServer.exe' process to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Dillon Beresford of NSS Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-2961.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-2983.title: Mozilla Seamonkey Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2011-2983.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Seamonkey. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-2982]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Gary Kwong, Igor Bukanov, Nils, and Bob Clary reported these vulnerabilities.When RegExp.input is set, a remote user can read data from other domains [CVE-2011-2983].shutdown reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: Red Hat reported that these flaws affect SeaMonkey. Mozilla has not issued an advisory for SeaMonkey.]
CVE-2011-2983.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-3010.title: TWiki Input Validation Flaw in Topic Create Screen and Spreadsheet Plugin Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2011-3010.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in TWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The topic create screen and the spreadsheet plugin is affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.mavitunasecurity.com/xss-vulnerability-in-twiki5/Mesut Timur reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-3010.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2011-3045.title: libpng Memory Error in png_inflate() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-3045.body: A vulnerability was reported in libpng. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image file that, when loaded by the target user via an application that uses libpng, will trigger an out-of-bounds heap buffer read and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application running libpng.The expansion of certain iCCP, iTXt, and zTXt PNG image file chunks is affected.
CVE-2011-3045.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-3046.title: Google Chrome Unspecified Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-3046.body: A vulnerability was reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an unspecified flaw and execute arbitrary code (outside of the sandbox) on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sergey Glazunov reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-3046.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2011-3048.title: libpng png_set_text_2() Memory Corruption Error May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-3048.body: A vulnerability was reported in libpng. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PNG file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption error in png_set_text_2() and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.
CVE-2011-3048.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2011-3066.title: Google Chrome Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-3066.body: A vulnerability was reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass cross-origin restrictions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An out-of-bounds memory read error may occur in Skia clipping [CVE-2011-3066]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A remote user can replace an iframe in a different domain [CVE-2011-3067]. Sergey Glazunov reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in run-in handling [CVE-2011-3068]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in line box handling [CVE-2011-3069]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in v8 bindings [CVE-2011-3070]. Google Chrome Security Team (SkyLined) reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in HTMLMediaElement [CVE-2011-3071]. pa_kt reported this vulnerability via HP TippingPoint ZDI.A cross-origin pop-up violation may occur [CVE-2011-3072]. Sergey Glazunov reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in SVG resource handling [CVE-2011-3073]. Arthur Gerkis reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in media handling [CVE-2011-3074]. Slawomir Blazek reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in applying the style command [CVE-2011-3075]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free memory error may occur in focus handling [CVE-2011-3076]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A read-after-free memory error may occur in script bindings [CVE-2011-3077]. Google Chrome Security Team (Inferno) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-3066.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass cross-origin restrictions.

CVE-2011-3078.title: Google Chrome Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2011-3078.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free, validation error, or race condition and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A use-after-free may occur in floats handling [CVE-2011-3078]. Google Chrome Security Team (Marty Barbella) and miaubiz reported this vulnerability.An IPC validation failure may occur [CVE-2011-3079]. PinkiePie reported this vulnerability.A race condition may occur in sandbox IPC [CVE-2011-3080]. Willem Pinckaers of Matasano reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free may occur in floats handling [CVE-2011-3081]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free may occur in the xml parser [CVE-2012-1521]. Google Chrome Security Team (SkyLined) and wushi of team509 (via iDefense VCP) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2011-3078.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
